1.content:
Tails was in his lab working on his latest invention. Well, maybe this one being his latest was a understatement. He had created many new inventions over the last few days. It seemed his brain was coming up with ideas faster then ever. But he had made so many inventions that he didn't have time to test them. He had just finished the machine he was working on. He looked at his inventions and sighed. "How am I ever going to test all of these?" He said.

Suddenly his alarm system went off. "Intruder detected in vault." Said his security system. Tails ran to his vault where he kept his valuables such as rings, and chaos emeralds. When he got there he opened the door to find none other then Rouge. "Rouge? what are you doing here?" He said. "What also would a master thief be doing in a vault?" Said Rouge. "But I can see This was a waste of time. There's nothing in here." Yes the vault was empty. But it was a security feature Tails had made. The vault was designed to teleport what ever was inside it to a empty dimension where no thief could get to it. and it could only be activated by Tails voice.

Then Tails had a Idea. "You came here for the chaos emerald didn't you?" He asked, knowing the answer. "No duh, Sherlock." Said Rouge. "Well, How about we make a deal? I have some inventions I haven't tested yet. If you help me test them, I'll give you the chaos emerald." Rouge thought about it. She decided it was the only way to get the emerald. "All right, I'll do it." She said. She followed Tails to the main part of the lab where he kept his most recent inventions. "What should I test first?" He thought.
1.title: So Many Inventions, So Little Time

"I can't keep her here. I don't know how to take care of a baby." Then a thought struck him. "Of course! Vanilla! She's already had a baby, so she can take care of one!" Tails gently took Rouge out of the container and returned her to her normal baby size.

He carried her to Vanilla and Creams house. He rang the door bell and Vanilla answered it. "Hello Tails." Then she noticed the baby bat in his arms. Upon hearing her friend Tails was the the door, Cream happily bounded over to see him. "Mommy, is Tails a daddy now?" She said at seeing Rouge.

Tails explained what had happened. "You changed Rouge into a baby so you could test your inventions!?" Said Vanilla. "Yes, and I need someone to take care of her while I fix it." Said Tails. "Well I suppose I could." Said Vanilla. "I have sort of wished to take care of a baby again. And I just happen to have some of Creams baby things."

"This will be fun!" Said Cream happily. "It will be like having a little sister!" Tails handed Rouge to Vanilla and went back to his lab.

Tails decided that he ought to make her grow larger, but before he could do that, he had to take her outside so that when she grew, she wouldn't bust the roof of the lab or anything like that. So he took her to a nice, quiet area with no one around, set her down on the ground & fired at her.

Soon the baby bat had grown huge in size, a little larger than a two story building, & that was just down on her hands & knees. The diaper snapped off so she was now naked. But since she now had the mentality of a baby, being naked was of no concern for her.

"Oops, guess I made her a little TOO huge..." said Tails, as he was looking up at the now giant infant.

Suddenly, Rouge turned curiously around & was immediately fascinated with her surroundings. "Ahhh," she said, looking around. Soon she began to crawl around, not realizing her now giant size was causing trouble for others. As she crawled out into the streets, she wound up flattening several cars out in the road & she didn't even recognize it. She was too busy gazing in awe at everything around her.

"Rouge, wait!" Tails called after her. But the baby didn't respond. At that point, she decided to try walking a little bit. So she lifted herself onto her feet & tried to gain balance, before taking several wobbly steps. Through this, she began bumping into a few buildings & she had to hoist herself onto a few of them in order to stay up, & as soon as she began walking, she was stepping on or accidentally kicking several things, like cars & pedestrians.

Tails figured he'd have to stop the giant baby from accidentally causing more harm. So Tails began spinning his distinctive twin tails, & flew after her.

132332222222222122221121.content:
The Nanny Bots were a friendly-looking type of robot that Tails had designed for infant and child care. They could also be referred to as "Nurse Bots", which was fitting since three were wearing nurse outfits, while the other three wore maid outfits. There were six in total, one for each baby, and all of them had big gentle light eyes and smiles and were designed in a way to not frighten small children.

One by one, the newborns were carefully lifted out of the play pen where they were lying and taken over to another part of the nursery, which looked more like a maternity ward. The babies were stripped naked and put through a series of tests. They were weighed, measured, had their foot prints taken, many of the procedures that a baby goes through when it's first born. After that was done, the Nanny Bots proceeded to bathe the regressed girls, and then diapered them, dressed them, placed tiny beanies on their heads, and swaddled them up, so they really did look like newly born infants. The bots then bottle-fed the babies, gave them pacifiers, and then rocked them off to sleep while playing gentle music through the voice boxes where their smiles were.

Then, the sleeping babies were placed into little nursery beds so they were all lined up nicely in a row. Cream and Vanilla got to share an extra large bed so they could be together. Once their work was finished, the Nanny Bots went to the other side of the room and went into sleep mode, awaiting any emergency that should come up.

As the newborn girls slept, Tails wondered if there was another test he could run on them. He had assumed that the regression had some sort of effect on them mentally, and was wondering if they could dream at this state. He could test one of his inventions on them to see what was going on in their heads, if they did have anything going on in there. But he also got the urge to try some more... unusual tests on them as well...

132332222222222122222112.content:
Tails decided to test out an aging device on Rouge first. He plans to eventually use it on himself to get older with the sole purpose to awaken any potential he has when it comes to his speed or natural flight abilities. He escorted Rouge to a lit up tube, and Rouge was lazily getting into the tube as she really wanted to get the jewel she desires most of all and get out. Tails heads to a nearby control panel to start the machine, and as he did, the lights in his lab started to flicker on and off, rapid and wildly.

"Oh come on, come on you!" Tails tried to get a handle on the control panel and alter his commands in a way so when the machine "worked" it wouldn't mess up his lab in some was as it has done before with other experiments.

"Uhh, kid, what's going on?" Rouge said, trying to keep the cool in her vocal tone, but all around worried for her safety, and maybe the kid's safety too. Tails turned his head to look at Rouge and gave a smile, a panicked, fake, forced smile.

"Don't worry, this has happened before, but I can fix it and readjust some controls and-" a noise from the machine interrupted him, and it started to work, sort of.

The lights in the tube grew dimmer and brighter in succession repeatedly, and quickly. Rouge started to feel weird, she was frightened, and she cried out in panic, but it was too late as the device already began the process. The tube was quickly filled with a liquid that was actually breathable, a fact Rouge didn't know, so she held her breathe for some time. Tails ran to the tube to see Rouge in distress.

Knowing that there's not much he can do now, all he says to her is "Listen Rouge, you can breathe in that liquid, trust me!" Rouge had a scared look on her face, something she rarely makes, and she does as the fox boy says and breathes in the liquid, to which he was proven correct and she felt safe. She looked the fox boy again, and he had a face of regret, and all he said to her before the process was over was "I'm sorry..."

This got Rouge to be even more scared, she thought she was going to die, instead something else happened, something one can consider to be the opposite. Rouge felt like she was shrinking, but in reality, she was aging backwards. She aged less and less, younger and younger, it got to the point that in the blink of an eye, Rouge was 13 to 10, and then from 10 to 4!

At the end, she regressed so much, that the only way she was able to be sustained was by either the tube, or if a volunteer decides to "carry" her, but it must have been done in the next few minutes. Tails reluctantly goes to the control panel to make some decisions. Once the machine was prepared, an operating table came out of the floor. Tails quickly lied down on it, the table automatically strapped him in, and he waited for the "carrier" process to begin. A beam of light was flashed on to his belly, and his belly started to glow orange. In the tube, Rouge was a fetus in a protective shell, but she then started to disappear from the tube, and through Tails machinery, Rouge was now slowly forming inside Tails through teleportation.

Tails himself wasn't having such a happy time, as the operation being done had to alter his body from the inside. He was able to find a quick work-around from having to do a crazy operation that would have required an artificial womb to be implanted, thus his beam of light was actually a device firing micro-machines so small, that they are altering his genetic code. As his genetic code was being reworked, Tails kept agitating on the table, the genetic rework being very unpleasant to feel. As this was happening, Rouge was then forming inside him, and his belly started to grow slowly, very slowly, and painfully.

Tails belly started out looking rather flat as Rouge began to enter, but that quickly changed as his flat midsection began to expand. Now a little bigger, looking a few months in, and his belly was also firm. More time goes by, and Tails looks like he was five months in, his belly being very noticeably larger and rounder. As this all went on, Tails cried out in pain, though he breathed rapidly as a means to get himself through the process easier. The last growth spurt occurred, as Tails' belly grew to look and technically be eight months into a pregnancy. His belly was at its most round, very firm, very large. Rouge was now being carried inside the young fox she tried to steal from, and the young two-tailed fox must wait until he can birth Rouge.

This was not a good day so far.
132332222222222122222112.title: Tails the Mother?

choices: Sonic and Cream are his babies.
Sonic and Knuckles are his babies.
1323322222222221222221121.content:
Tails lied down on the table, disappointed with himself for making the same mistake again when it comes to his machine. He placed his gloved hand on his expanded belly, patted it, and shook his head. He thought to himself, "Rouge, I am so sorry, I'm not sure how I can make this up to you, but I'll find a way to fix this." Tails slowly sat up to accommodate himself to get off the table, his two legs now hanging off the table. His lower back started to hurt a bit, but he knows the pain will dim soon, and he will get used to it again. Tails carefully got off from the table and stood up, but as he did, his legs felt like gelatin, Tails was loosing some balance, but he caught himself from falling down by holding on to the side of the table.

After some time getting re-used to his situation, Tails wobbled towards the tube Rouge was in. The machine itself was going through a cooling down that will take at least few days to finish. Once Tails was in front of the tube, he opened the door to get it as it is now unlocked, and what he saw inside were Rouge's very provocative jumpsuit, her boots, and her gloves. Tails collected the articles of clothing, having to slowly bend down to grab all of them and slowly get back up, and he then waddled to the his experimental washing machine that can clean any type of clothes by detecting it, no matter what. This experimental machine also only failed once, and that was when he used it for the first time. Tails thought to himself once more, "Oh boy, I can only guess what the others will think this time. After promising that I wouldn't mess with the machine again, after they nagged me on and on about it, geez I'm gonna get it for sure this time! Three strikes, three strikes, three strikes already!" Tails bang his hand on the washer angrily, but he regretted it as it actually hurt him than actually helped.

The young two-tailed fox was leaning his back on the washer, turning his head to look at a nearby mirror. While looking from the side, he really noticed how large his pregnant belly was, especially since it looked like he was trying to bush out his belly as well due to the pose he was in. He blushed in slight embarrassment and looked away... for just a second. He turned his head back, and he rolled his eyes, finding the situation somewhat laughable in its absurdity. He stood up as straight as he could, side looking to the mirror from its side, and he placed his hands on his belly. He began to rub his pregnant gut, as it did make him feel better. The sensual feeling he gets as his belly is rubbed is something Tails has grown accustomed to over the past few months. He started to think that he actually enjoyed being pregnant, but there was something missing that made him fully appreciate the pregnancy he was in.

Just as that thought happened, the little Rouge inside Tails began kicking him, and that's when Tails remembered the happy little moments that makes being pregnant worth it in the end. He rubbed his belly even more, finding enjoyment and happiness in a dark place at a dark time. He smiled and closed his eyes, he was in bliss...

BEEP

BEEP

BEEP

That was until a call was coming through from Tails computer. He was freaking out, he had no idea who could be calling him, he had a few guesses, and those guesses scared him. The fox dashed as quickly as he could to the computer, reluctantly answering the call. Worst possible scenario, it was Amy. Tails tried to get as close to the camera as he could, trying to hide his belly.

"Hey Tails, how you doing?" Amy sounded sinister, as if she already knew something happened.

"Uh, hey Amy, how you doing?" Tails was getting very nervous already, his voice quivered and he began to sweat, "I-I-I'm doing okay," he was stuttering too. Any more obvious he was trying to hide something, he'd just admit it.

"I'm doing well. I was just in Vanilla's home, taking care of the babies while you were out in your lab for some reason, and out of nowhere the ground shook!" Some anger was getting out of Amy's system.

"Really? Is everyone in the house okay?" Tails sounded legitimately nervous for many reasons. One because he was truly worried for the safety of the others, the other reason because now he knows for sure why Amy would guess that he screwed up again.

"Oh don't worry, we're all fine. Though I'm a bit worried for you, because the lights around your lab were going crazy! You're not doing anything you should be doing, are you?!" Amy questioned him hard, and the pressure was getting to Tails pretty hard. He started breathing anxiously, he was sweating profusely, and he unwittingly rubbed his pregnant belly and made it noticeable to the camera without knowing he did, pretty much outing himself already without knowing he did.

"No, no, I'm fine, don't worry, no need to come here!" Tails voice was just cracking, he knew he was in deep trouble.

Amy began to growl, "NO! YOU ARE NOT FINE! I CAN SEE WHAT YOU DID TO YOURSELF AGAIN!" Amy screamed angrily to the fox and pointed to his belly, which Tails was still rubbing, though he did stop.

"Yes, I messed up again, I'm sorry! I thought it wouldn't happen again this time, I thought I had all the kinks worked out, and I didn't mean to!" Tails teared up a bit. Amy noticed his tears and she sighed.

"Yeah, I know you didn't mean to do this to yourself..." Amy looked away from the camera and crossed her arms, "A boy your age should not be the parent to so many kids. A few flickys, a lot of ricky's, a single picky, and two of your friends..." Amy scolded him subtly, but she truly did mean well. She turned her head to look at the camera again, "Okay Tails, meet me in Vanilla's house. She isn't here yet, but the babies are, so you better come here as quickly as possible... I'm worried," with those last two words, Amy turned her head away again and teared up herself.

Tails got up and sighed, cleaning up his own tears, and went off to meet his children, aka, two of his friends.

13233222222222212222221121.content:
Thinking quickly, Tails started to spin his twin tails around to fly, and then proceeded to follow after the rolling sphere containing the fetus of Rouge. He managed to keep up with Rouge, flying high enough to see her clearly. What surprised him, however, was how, even though Rouge was helpless at this moment, she somehow managed to avoid being stepped on or run over or hit by any obstacles in the way.

Eventually, Tails followed Rouge all the way to the shore of the lake. The uterus sphere rolled across the top of a smooth rock at the edge of the lake and started to fall toward the water. Tails noticed this and dived downwards as fast as he could, and just before Rouge hit the water, Tails managed to grab her in time, hovering over the surface of the lake with a firm grip around the fetus. Not firm enough to hurt the fetal bat, but firm enough to keep it from falling in.

Holding the fetus close to him, Tails flew over to the shore and sat down, observing Rouge. She started to squirm around and suck her thumb again. Tails couldn't help but be mesmerized by tiny she was in this state, so helpless, so cute. Tails gently touched the transparent pink covering, and Rouge kicked, not hard enough to push against the uterus wall, but hard enough to be felt. After that sudden reaction, Rouge settled down again and curled up into a fetal position once again. Tails slipped the uterus sphere into a bag, so that it wouldn't somehow slip out of his grasp, and flew back to the lab.

When he returned, he was trying to figure out what to do next.

"Okay." Tails said adjusting the settings. "This will decrease your age about six years."
"Six years?!" She yelled. "I'll only be four years old!"
"Yeah I know," Tails said turning on the machine. "But its easier for the very young to adjust so it will make things easier."
"Well, if you say so..." Rouge said reluctantly agreeing. She stepped into the large machine and it started to work. You could see her inside and her slowly get smaller. After about ten minutes she was ten years old, her breast gone, also by this time her cloths had fallen off so the screen made it so that she could not be seen. After about another ten minutes the door opened, and out walked a small four year old bat wrapped in a blanket.
"Rouge?" Tails said kneeling down to her, he wasn't sure if doing this would erase her memories or not.
"Who are you?" The little Rouge said, sounding scared. "Wh-wheres mommy?!" She was on the brink of tears. "Where am I?!" She started screaming and crying.Tails quickly picked her up and tried to calm her down.
"Sh sh, its okay. My name is Tails and I'll take care of you!" He wanted to see all the effects of his experiment before turning her back.
Rouge was starting to calm down a bit. "Where am I?"
"You're at my house. Hm I think you could use some cloths." He dug around in his closet and found the smallest shirt he could find. He put it on Rouge but it was still huge on her.
She giggled. "Big shirt!"
"Yep, big shirt." Tails agreed.
"I'm hungry!" Rouge yelled. "I want candy!"
"Sorry," Tails said, "No candy."
"I WANT CANDY!" She screamed.
"No!" Tails said firmly. "You are going to eat what I give you and you are going to like it!"
Rouge immediately obeyed, recognizing the tone. "Okay...."
"That's a good girl," Tails said. "Now I'll get dinner ready"

A few days went by and no other side effects made themselves apparent, Rouge acted like any normal four year old so Tails decided to turn her back to normal.
So he put her back in the machine while she was sleeping turned it on and.......

choices: Tails wakes up in the middle of the night
13233222222222222.content:
"Hmmh??" Mumbled a little bat.

"Oh no, what happened to the machine?!" Asked Tails to himself, looking at the control console. But then he turned to Rouge as she needed more immediate attention.

"Ohhh man." Tails said nervously as he picked her up and held her at arms length. Her big shirt was now even bigger on her. "Heyyy, Rouge?"

"Uhmmhm..." Rouge mumbled again. She had just been woken up so she was being quite groggy. "Who are yoo?" She asked quietly.

"Darnit." Tails thought to himself. "She went back a whole other year, and now her memory of meeting me a few days ago is gone too. Guess I should reintroduce myself."

"*ahem* Hello," Tails said aloud as he sat Rouge into a chair, "my name is Tails. And your name is Rouge, right?" He wasn't sure if she would even be very familiar with her own name at this age.

"Yesh. What 'm I doin' here?" Rouge replied.

"Um, I'll--heh heh--I'll take care of you! Don't worry." Tails picked her up again and tried his best to lull her back to sleep.

"O--okey..." Rouge whispered as she closed her eyes and drifted into slumber.

Tails laid her in his bed as he tried to decide what to do.
"Okay okay, stay calm, stay calm..." Tails said to himself. "I guess before I start working on fixing the machine, I need to worry about taking care of Rouge. Hmm, I guess it shouldn't be much different than when she was four. All that's changed is she hasn't learned her ABC's yet, heh heh. Wait what am I saying? What would I know about the brain development of a bat? I've never lived with bats, I have no idea at what age they learn to read, or hit puberty, or learn algebra, or get potty trained, or... oh no, potty training!"

Tails ran up to the bed and gently pulled out the covers to see if Rouge had any accident. Thankfully, she didn't. So he put the blanket back onto her.

He then went to his database computer and searched for information.
"Alright, so according to this, bats typically start toilet training at age 3, and finish at 4. So Rouge is definitely going to need some protection..."

Tails got up and crawled under his bed, pulling out a large bag of pull-ups.
"Good thing I wet the bed." Tails said with a smirk. "Hmm, I think these are too big for her though."
He looked under the bed again.
"Oh hey! I forgot I have these pull-ups too for when Cream is over." Tails said, pulling out a different package.
"These should fit Rouge perfectly." Tails slowly slid the pull-up on the three-year-old bat, and sure enough, it fit perfectly.

Tails sat on his chair and looked at Rouge some more.
"You know... Cream is considerably taller than her. I wonder why the pull-ups still fit so well? Oh right, because Rouge was born in the early 90's, where everyone was more plump and wide, more Mickey Mouse style. So now that Rouge is so young, she looks more like she did then. But wait a minute, I first appeared in the early 90's right next to Sonic, but after all that time I've gotten taller and slimmer but haven't grown any older. Or wait, I think I was four years old in that one TV show... how old was I in that other show where I didn't do anything?"

Tails rolled his eyes, figuring it's pointless to try to understand the continuity of the franchise, and go to bed instead.

He got up and slid one of his larger pull-ups on, then brushed his teeth, then crawled into bed--trying to give Rouge as much space as he could.
"*yawn* I hope I'll be able to get everything fixed by... *yawn* ...tomorrow." And with that, Tails closed his eyes and he went to sleep.

141.content:
"It will only last about two hours or so. I've tested it on mice, and since you are a close relative of mice, it should have about the same effect on you" Tails said calmly. "Hey Tails! I'm no relative of those filthy animals! But I won't punish you for your slight mistake, sweetie" Rouge said with a wink". "A-Actually R-Rouge... i think i won't let you have the potion. Things could get out of hand, y-you know..," Tails stuttered. "I mean..." "Oh come on Tails, don't be so silly. Plus, you wanted me to test your stuff, didn't you?" Rouge snarled. She snatched the vial from Tails' hand and drank it all in one go. It only took a few seconds for Rouge's body to completely fade out.

Rouge had a plan. She would first make Tails unconscious, and then try out stuff that looked interesting to her.

She flew up to have a good look at the lab, and spotted a section called 'Anestethics' Meanwhile, Tails was starting to get worried about the situation "Rouge! Rouge! Come back here, now! You can't just use my inventions without my permission!" Oh, yes I can, Rouge thought. She picked up a small bottle. It said that it was enough to keep someone unconscious for about 3 hours. Perfect, she thought. And to her amazement, when she picked up the bottle, it became invisible as well, meaning Tails couldn't see it coming.

"Rouge! I'm telling you, you'll pay for this!" Tails shouted "Calm down, calm down, I'm coming, my dear" She said with a devious smile.

"What the, I don't see an emerald in here!" Rouge said crossly, she had began turning empty tables over, hoping to find the emerald, and while she did that, Tails tried hard not to laugh as he aimed his hypnosis beam toward Rouge, and pressed the button.
Immediately Rouge jumped up and turned around, she looked like a zombie again. Tails then said, "Okay Rouge, now, whenever I ring this cowbell..." Tails grabbed his old cowbell he loved when he was little and made sure Rouge could see it, "...you will act like a cow."
"Act like a cow..." Rouge muttered emotionlessly.
"And," Tails continued, "When I say, 'banana' you'll act like a rooster."
"Act like a rooster..." Rouge echoed.
"Good, now Rouge," Tails held up the bell and rang it loudly.
"MOOO! MOOO!" Rouge bellowed as louhd as she could, she got down on all fours and began moving her lips along the ground as is she were grazing. Sonic cracked up. "Tails, you outdid yourself! Let me try!"
"Rouge, would you like a banana right now?" Sonci asked.
"COCK-A-DOODLE-DOOO!" Rouge screamed, she began flapping her arms and hopped around. "Cock-a-doodle-doo!"
Tails and Sonic hi-fived each other. "This is amazing! Let's try something new!" Tails said eagerly.
It took a few moments for Rouge to stop 'cock-a-doodle-dooo-ing!' Again.
"Alright." Sonic saids in a low deep voice, "Whenever I hold up this pair of scissors." Sonci grabbed a pair of woodshop scissors and waved them in front of Rouge, "You will shriek like a little girl." Rouge nodded mutely. "Shriek like a little girl..."
Tails snapped his fingers, Sonic waved the scissors in front of Rouge, and Rouge, well...
"EEEEEEEKKK!" Rouge shrieked so loud the noise would run around in their ears for day s to come. But that didn't matter. Rouge didn't just scream, she tried to look for a place to hide, shrieking the whole time like she had just seen a monster. Tails and Sonic fell over, not from the noise, but because they were laughing too hard. Tails pounded the ground, while Sonic crashed into a table from rolling so much, it toppled over and fell over right in front of Sonic, which set them both off again. You could hear them laughing even over Rouge's screaming.
Finally, Tails exclaimed, "BANANA!"
"COCK-A-DOODLE-DOO!"
Sonic managed to ring the bell.
"MOOO!"
"BANANA!"
"COCK-A-DOODLE-DOO!"
The cowbell rang loudly.
"MOOO!"
"Banana! Banana! Banana!"
"COCK-A-DOODLE-DOO! COCK-A-DOODLE-DOO! COCK-A-DOODLE-DOO!!!"
Finally, after twenty minutes of hypnosis fun. Rouge tried mooing once she heard the cowbell. But nothing came out. She tried again, still nothing. She lost her voice!
Finally Sonic and Tails got a hold of themselves. Their ribs, faces, and stomachs hurt from laughing so hard. When the doorbell rang, "I'll get it." Tails panted. he hobbled to the door, when he opened it a police officer handed Tails a piece of paper. "A fine for noise pollution." He said. "Good day."
Tails read the note. it was 45$ just for noise pollution!
"That's crazy!" Sonic exclaimed when he saw the note.
"What is?" Rogue managed to rasp.
Neither Tails or Sonic wanted to say, so Tails rang the cowbell. "Moo!" Rouge managed to cough out. It sounded incredibly silly.
Sonic and Tails looked at each other, then they cracked up again.

15332222222212.content:
As the gas started to fill the device, Rouge began to black out. Before she lost consciousness, she had time to wonder if maybe this hadn't been such a good idea...

Suddenly Rouge was awake. She knew she had been out for a long time, but she had no way of telling how long. She sat up and looked around, and, while she was still in Tails' lab, something was definitely wrong. Just then Tails entered the lab whistling. "Ah I see you're adjusting rather well to your new form! That is excellent news! It means we can proceed with testing immediately!" he said, a huge smile on his face. "My new form?" Rouge inquired. Hold on. Her voice sounded weird. Not bad exactly, just different. More, electronic. ELECTRONIC?!

She glanced down. What she saw made her wish she hadn't. She was covered in what looked like futuristic armor, and, judging by the sound of her voice, it probably went a lot further than just 'skin deep'. Rouge started to panic. She felt like she might faint! Oh god, could she still faint!?

"What happened?!" she screamed. "What did you do?!" "Take it easy Rouge. I just put your brain in the body of an amphibious robot," Tails stated. "Just put my- WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT?! And what did you do with my original body? You didn't throw it out did you? Oh god, I can just see it rotting in some dumpster somewhere, being eaten away by-" Suddenly there was a clanging noise, and Rouge was sent reeling.

"ROUGE! GET A HOLD OF YOURSELF!" Tails shouted. "Your body is fine. I've got it on life support. I wouldn't just throw it out. That would be disgusting, and wasteful, and I'd have to deal with another investigation." Rouge stiffened, about to start panicking again. "JOKING!" Tails said quickly. "Don't start panicking again please! If you start panicking, I'LL start panicking. And if I start panicking things will get really messy, really quickly!"

"Okay. Okay. I'm calm. I'm calm. I've been placed in a robot body, but I'm calm." "Thank you," Tails said. "Now, can you PLEASE tell me WHY you did this?" "Oh, sure. There's a number of reasons. I wanted to test this new amphibious shell, and i didn't have any spare AI that could handle it. I had a new design for neural interface I wanted to test. And I wanted to do some tests to see how an ostensibly normal person might react to being converted into a full body cyborg. Your panic attack has proven most informative by the way."

"Okay," said Rouge, "Now, tell me why I shouldn't strangle the life out of you right now." "I have three good reasons. One; you're a good person who couldn't live with a murder on their shoulders. Two, I'd cry like a little girl and no one wants to see that. Three you can't. Even if I hadn't put a safeguard in to prevent you from harming yourself or others, your new body isn't really all that much tougher than your normal one."

Rouge thought about this for a minute. "You raise some excellent points and I have been convinced to live with the situation for now. So, what do we do next?"

Finally needing air he pushed his head out and looked up at Rouge who was blushing with a shocked look. At first Tails though it was because she was embarrassed that she hugged him into that position, but when Tails looked at his hands he saw that they were touching her... well in order too pulls his head out he had to gain leverage so he grabbed onto the nearest thing. Tails quickly let go blushing and sweating at the same time. His first kiss, and now this? For a young boy Tails was growing up fast.

Rouge puckered lips no doubt meaning a kiss.

Tails quickly said "Uh hold on! Technically the document says I can only do after you tested something."

[If it's so good, why didn't you use it when you created me? It isn't dangerous is it?:(] she asked, clearly worried. "Oh no, it's not dangerous, just not very bright. It isn't good at inventing new procedures, it can only modify existing ones to suit changing circumstances. It not good enough to completely replace biological doctors yet. But I can't very well perform the operation on myself, so I'm programming it with the data it needs to do it for me. Aaaand... Done! Okay, let's get started!"

And with that, Tails activated the robot, and went to lie down on the same operating table where Rouge and Etch had been separated. As soon as he was comfortable, the robot stood up, and went right to work. The robot copied the procedure Tails had performed on Rouge almost exactly, and with great efficiency. Soon it's work was done, and it returned to it's charging nacelle to power down. Etch carried rouge over to the table and put her down on it, before sitting down herself in a nearby chair, while they waited for the anesthetic to wear off.

As they watched him, they couldn't help but think about how cute he was, both his head and his newly independent body. His disembodied head looked so small and helpless, while his body had curled up with it's tails cutely wrapped around itself. The whole scene just screamed 'adorable'.

Slowly, both his head and his body began to awaken, with his head yawning cutely, while his body stretched it's arms. The head blinked and looked around sleepily. "Rouge? Etch? Did it work?" he asked, still feeling a bit blurry from the anesthetic. "I'll say it did!" Rouge exclaimed happily, while Etch, to excited for words, just scooped both Rouge and Tails up into the biggest hug she could muster. [Hey! What about me?] Tails' former body exclaimed in an indignant manner. Etch's hologram flickered in confusion for moment before pulling him into her loving embrace as well.

After a few moments, Rouge cleared her throat, and etch quickly released all of them in embarrassment. "Well, now that Etch has finally stopped trying to crush us, what should we do now?" she asked. [Well I, for one, think we should figure out the name situation, before anything else,] Etch suggested. This was met with a a general murmur of agreement, except for Tails' body, which flickered it hologram in agreement instead. "Okay, so, who wants to be called what?" Rouge asked. "Tails' body, you go first." [Well, I was thinking about taking our old nickname, Tails, as my actual name. Seeing as I'm the one with the two tails and everything.] "Alright, from now on Tails is your name. What about you, Tails' head? What would you like to be called?" [Wait a moment,] Etch interjected. [Why don't we just call him Miles? I mean, that was his real name, right?] "Yes, Miles is my real name, and I intend to keep it. But I don't really like people to call me by it. It just feels too official for my tastes," Tails' head explains. "Alright, a nickname then. What do you want your new nickname to be?" Rouge asked again. "Well, your body renamed herself 'Etch'. How about 'Sketch'? I think it actually fits pretty well, considering I'm an inventor and everything." [Oh, that is just so cute!] Etch gushed. [We have matching names now!]

[Okay, now that we've figured out what our names are, I say we pair off and get to know one another better,] Tails decided. How do they pair off?

1533222222222112121222211121111212112212.content:
"well..." Tails states, thinking, "There is a special anesthetic I've been wanting to try out that could be handy here."

[Sounds Neat. Lets get started.]

Guiding his body over to a small metal cabinet, he takes out an injection gun filled with a blue liquid while Etch caries Rouge over to a work table.
Taking the cylinder of liquid out of the injection gun, and inserting it into a machine, he starts to type at a computer.

"What are you doing Tails?" Rouge asks, curious as to what might be causing his delay, and unable to see the screen from this angle. Etch seems to be rather curious as well, walking up behind him and reading the code over his shoulder.

"Well, if the nanotech in this serum is to be permanent, they'll need a way to recharge, so I'm modifying them to run off of the chaos drive I put in the neck-plate." Tails answers looking over at Rouge, "and if these numbers are right it, taking over brain function will actually draw less power than keeping your brain inside your head. Huh... I'll have to remember that for later."

Taking the canister out of his machine and injecting about half of it into Rouge, passing what was left to Etch and politely asking her to put it back in the cabinet for him. Had she been on his operating table, she wouldn't have seen a thing, but his work bench had a mirror on it so he could see both sides of what he was working on. She watched curiously as Tails meticulously worked through the process of opening her skull, gently levering up her brain and cutting the connections to her senses. The brain stem didn't need to be cut, as it only had about an inch of spine attached to it, and slid out easily enough.

Once the brain was out, Tails inserted a rubber ring around the cut edges of the skull, a little hinge in the back, and a latch in the front. Leaving her head able to be opened and closed like a container, before closing her up and brushing her facial fur a bit to hide the seam.

"There. All finished." He stated, triumphantly, taking a moment to admire his work and of course, give rouge her payment.

[Any ideas what to do with the brain?] Etch asked, coming up behind the two after putting the injection gun away.

153322222222222211211112212.title: The Journey Inside Rouge

1533222222222222112111122121.content:
Tails assessed the map. "Ok, I'm currently in an artery in Rouge's left arm... So I'm going the wrong way, I'll need to find my way to a vein and follow it to the heart. No problem!" he exclaimed, steering his ship along a massive tunnel. Huge discs considerably larger than his ship constantly whizzed along the artery - they were of course, Rouge's red blood cells. Tails took note of how big they were. "Whoa! They're huge! Maybe I over did it on the shrinking..." he thought. "No matter, if I can get close enough, I should be able to hitch a ride on one of her red blood cells!" He zoomed towards the nearest one. "I'd better let Rouge know what's going on..." Tails said, flicking a switch from red to green.

Rouge lay on the table, strapped in and anxious. All of a sudden she heard Tails voice over an intercom. "Rouge, I'm about to hitch a ride on one of your red blood cells. It'll take me along your arm and turn me around once I reach your hand." Rouge was relieved that he was communicating with her. She wasn't sure she liked the idea of Tails taking a silent tour of her insides - who knows what he'd get up to. She spoke back. "Roger that sugar!"

Tails waited for the blood cell to turn so that it was at least somewhat horizontal before landing his craft near it's centre. "I'm on. The rest is up to you now Rouge. Just try to take it easy. Any unecessary activity could make my job a lot harder." Rouge responded with a casual "no problem" and did as she was told. Tails relaxed as well, observing the wonderous sights from the safety of the cockpit. He was definitely small. Rouge's red blood cell was the length of two football pitches in comparison to his craft. He considered taking a closer look outside, but then decided against it. He didn't want to get seperated from the ship at this size. He might never see the light of day again, unless Rouge burped him up or something. Not a pleasant thought. Instead, he simply leant back in his chair and turned the ship's power off. He took a moment to take in his situation. He watched as a flurry of equally gigantic red discs zoomed alongside his own. He listened as Rouge's heart pumped the blood through her body - he imagined the heart somewhere far away, a gargantuan living engine resting in her chest.

After a while, Tails had entered the insides of Rouge's left hand. He sat up and turrned the power on. "Ah well, looks like the free ride's over." he said, pulling the joystick towards himself. His ship detatched itself from the massive vessel and floated away from it. Tails turned the ship and followed a different tunnel back the way he'd come. More red blood cells bustled along it and Tails soon found himself caught in a mighty torrent of them. "Here we go Rouge! Full steam ahead!"

Rouge was unimpressed. "So it took you all that effort to just turn around, not that YOU actually did much..." she bit. She looked at her arm. "Hey, it's not like I could fight against the flow of blood. My craft is extremely tiny you know!" he argued, not wanting to let Rouge win. "Ok fine, whatever. Just do your thing and be careful in there. My body's a finely crafted temple." she gloated. "More like a planet..." Tails muttered under his breath. He continued to maneuver past the gigantic blood cells, trying to beat them to the finish. All of a sudden he felt a massive rumble shake the craft as he lost all momentum. Warning lights flashed on the ship's console and the words "Antibodies detected!" flashed on the display sceen. Tails tried to accelerate, but nothing happened. He was stuck. "Uh-oh! Rouge's antibodies are trying to destroy the craft! At this size it won't last long!" He watched as a white gooey substance covered his sub - it had been absorbed by a white blood cell larger even than the massive red blood cells. It began it's attempt to dissolve the tiny vessel into nothing, but the sub held out for a time. Tails scrambled about the cockpit. "Rouge! Bad news! Your antibodies are trying to destroy me!"

"Well what do you want me to do? I'm strapped to a table and I can hardly control my inner bodily functions!" she snapped. "Don't you have any defences?" Tails fumbled about the controls. "I could electrify the hull but it would take time. Alternatively, I've got a chaos emerald wired in to the core of the ship, so I could warp out." he explained. Rouge's ears perked up at the mention of chaos emeralds. "What!? You took a chaos emerald into my body!? And why don't you just use the warp to get to my brain? It'd have saved us alot of time." Tails struggled to stabilise the ship. "If I use the emergency warp I could end up anywhere!" Rouge almost rolled her eyes. "Anywhere has to be better than in the company of my antibodies." she said. Now, where was I?" he triumphantly went on. Rouge rolled her eyes and spoke to him. "Finally! I thought you'd never stop complaining! It was your idea to turn yourself into the smallest inhabitant of my body." Tails grabbed the joystick and continued to zoom along the vein, dodging gigantic blood cells as he went.

The further he went, the louder her heartbeat became. He knew he was going the right way now. The rythmic beating was everywhere. It echoed and reverberated through the entire area. Tails assessed the map and noticed he was just about leaving her shoulder and entering her chest area. "Rouge, I'm about to enter your chest cavity." Just then the stomach shook violently and Tails craft was rocked about the gastric juices. "I don't know if I can... I'm stuck in here... and what's worse, you're hungry!"

1533222222222222112111122122122.content:
When Tail's sub finally jolted to a halt, it was forced into an enormous tunnel. It seemed to stretch on for miles on end in either direction. It's width was pretty impressive too, at least for the microscopic fox and his craft.

The area was dark and cloudy. Greenish brown gasses occupied the dry air, making visibility an issue. Loud echoing roars can be heard from all directions. "Please tell me I'm not where I think I am..." Tails spoke outloud. As if to confirm his realisation, the area shook with an enormous gutteral grumble. Tails looked down at the display of his craft. The virtual map was his final confirmation.

"I'm in Rouge's large intestine! Meaning those noises were... and those gasses are... I think I'm gonna be sick!"

His microscopic sub floated quietly in the dark foggy tunnel of her digestive tract.

Outside, Rouge felt the odd groan in her lower belly. "Come on Tails..." she said, struggling against her restraints.

Back inside her tummy, Tails was considering his options. He looked at the onboard display, simulating possible courses on the virtual map of Rouge's innards. "Hmm... I could follow her bowel movements to the rectum and leave her body... Or I could possibly head the other way and move up into her small intestine or stomach. From there, I could reenter the bloodstream and hopefully make it to her brain. Though fighting against the flow of digestion could be tough..."
1533222222222222112111122122122.title: Rouge's Depths

choices: He makes it to her small intestine
15332222222222221121111221221222.content:
Tails surmised that his best option would be to turn the sub around and traverse her digestive system backwards. Leaving her body served no immediate purpose and leaving via Rouge's "back door" was a concept just a tad too embarassing for the little fox. He began to pilot the craft through Rouge's gas-filled bowels. This was easier said than done, due to the lack of light and the foggy air clouding his view. Without his map, he'd have been in much worse predicament. It appeared to be smooth sailing. The walls grumbled and roared and suddenly Tail's craft was struck by an almighty blast of air. It was knocked off course by this viscious hurricane.

Rouge felt the bubbling gasses in her abdomen. She had to do it. She let loose a tiny fart, feeling relieved and embarassed at the same time. "Good thing Tails wasn't here to see that," she smiled, "at least... I hope he didn't hear it."

Rouge couldn't have been more wrong. Tails heard it all right. He saw it, smelt it and felt it too. Like a huge vacuum it nearly blasted his ship to pieces. Tails read the on-screen display. "Damage critical, engine damage 67%, hull breached, suggest evacuation." Tails was terrified. His sub was going nowhere! He quickly checked the on-board wardrobe, spying a special inner body scuba suit. He quickly donned the gear and filled a backpack with supplies. Securing his breath mask, he opened the entry hatch of his sub. He was hit by the full relentless stench of all of Rouge's past meals. Then, after a minute or so, he leapt out into the dangerous world of Rouge. He spun his tails and flew through her gaseous bowels.
15332222222222221121111221221222.title: Tails VS Digestion

153322222222222211211112212212221.content:
"Pee-yew! It stinks in here! Well, I guess I am in her bowels." he spoke to himself, his head scanning left and right as he flew through the musky green air. His visor would steam up every now and then, so he had to keep wiping it to keep it clear. The intestine roared once more. Though Tails did not get hit by this fart, instead it blasted through underneath him. It did make him look down for a brief moment. He could make a vast brown mountain range below - the thought of it below him provided him with the will to fight his exhaustion and remain airborne.

Rouge lay struggling. Her belly groaned as her hunger grew more powerful.

Tails continued to grow tired and he was starting to give up. Rouge's bowel was impossibly huge! But as he slowly descended he caught a quick glimpse of her sphincter in the distance. The gateway to Rouge's small intestine! Just a couple hundred metres away, the enormous portal twisted and turned. Tails mustered the last of his strength and zoomed straight for it's centre. The closer it got, the larger it became. Tails was able to fly through it when it was "closed". He plopped down onto the soft floor of her small intestine.
153322222222222211211112212212221.title: Going against the flow

1533222222222222112111122122122211.content:
Tails decided to perservere. Standing up, he began his flight through Rouge's small intestine. It was considerably less cruel than her large intestine, but it was still an enormous tunnel. Tails tried to avoid colliding with her villi. He figured that entering Rouge's bloodstream without the aid of a map would be a wasted endeavor. The thought of being lost in the unimaginable labarynth of her circulatory system at the size of a mere bacterium scared the fox. He shuddered.

After an eternity of navigating the many and great twists and turns of Rouge's bowel, Tails finally saw his target. Another gigantic sphincter high above, so large it could swallow Mobius, Tails thought. He flew full pelt through the enormous gaping hole and emerged in a new place.

Rouge's stomach was an enormous spherical chamber that stretched into the distance as far as he could see. After quickly surfacing from the vile sea of green liquid that was Rouge's digestive acid, Tails decided he was due a break and landed on the remains of something Rouge had eaten earlier. Suddenly there was a great gurgling sound as the stomach shook violently.

Rouge lay looking at her grumbling round belly and moaned. "I'm so hungry!"
1533222222222222112111122122122211.title: To the Stomach!

15332222222222221121111221221222111.content:
Tails sat back, exhausted atop a mound of partially digested... something. At this point it was impossible to tell what it had once been. Rouge's hungry tummy roared and groaned, waiting for the beautiful bat to satisfy her hunger. But it waitedin vain.

Tails island slowly melted away and sank into the ocean below. He leapt off and spun his tails frantically. He now had to stay airborne or he'd be digested. Considering that digestion would undo all his intestinal progress, Tails tried extra hard to stay in flight. However luck was on his side.

Deep below, bubbles had began to form and gather in the centre of the stomach. They gathered and built in size, before finally rising steadily upwards.

Tails had succumb to the hot, airless atmosphere and grew exhausted. Removing his mask, he caught a foul unfiltered whiff of the belly's contents. Then his tails stopped and he fell unconscious, plummetting fast for a fate of digestion. But then he was suddenly hit by something. A powerful blast of air that carried him upwards.

Rouge snapped her upper restraints at last and sat up. She then let loose an almighty belch. She put a hand to her curved belly and whistled. "Excuuuuuse me! Now... It's time to eat!"
15332222222222221121111221221222111.title: BELCH

choices: It's now or never Tails! Get inside her!
153322222222222211211112212212221112.content:
Tails' unconscious body sailed clear through her lips. He was launched outwards. He landed on an enormous black plain, which was soft and somewhat bouncy. As he slowly came to he looked around. He was longer trapped inside of Rouge, that much was certain. But where was he? He stood and scanned the horizon. Far in the distance he could make out two long stretches of black land which ended in ginormous white and pink mountains. Tails jumped on the spot a couple of times, getting a feel for the land. Soft. He turned 180º and saw that his plain of soft ground stopped and turned upwards into a cliff. Two enormous mounds stuck out way above him, obstructing his view.
The ground quaked violently and Tails heard the familiar groaning of Rouge's stomach... from below him.

"I'm on Rouge's stomach!" exclaimed Tails. "Beats being in it" he said.

Rouge leant foward, trying to free her legs from their restraints.

"I've gotta get to Rouge's brain before she breaks-" he was interrupted as the world turned on it's side. Rouge stood up, free at last. She picked up the straps that once held her and put them into her mouth. GULP! Tails heard them splash into her stomach. He was clutching her round belly, like a parasite clinging to it's host.

Then Rouge grew a little, expanding around the already microscopic fox. Tails' robot rushed to restrain her, but she simply bit gobbled it up. She grew some more, now just shy of the ceiling.

"Right now to undo Tail's shrink ray and grow to my real size!" she said, approaching the shrink ray.

Tails quickly leapt off of Rouge and took flight. He elevated himself up past her colossal breasts and flew before her gaping mouth once more. Without a second to lose he zoomed straight in and down Rouge's gullet.

Looking around, Tails began to salvage what he could. After a moment, he'd fashioned himself a jetpack. "This should help! It's quicker and It means I shouldn't tire out!" he exclaimed, donning the gizmo.

He flew from the wreckage as it submerged and melted away. His next job was to get out of her stomach... again. He flew up towards the bat's throat, but as he did so, the entire stomach started to stretch further into the distance. She was getting bigger! Rouge had unshrunk herself to her previous giant size!

She towered over the lab and her belly gurgled. "I won't be needing this anymore!" she said, tossing the shrink ray into her mouth. With a loud exaggerated "gulp" it was gone. "Mmm... tasty!"

Tails saw the machine plummet into her massive belly. But he had no time to go back for it. He activated the jetpack and blasted his way out of Rouge's mouth once more. He turned at gazed upon her planetary size(to him at least). He then sped straight up her nose, hoping to reach her brain.

Rouge was taking the city apart, devouring it bit by bit. The more she ate, the bigger she became. She was pushing 500ft when she adressed her microscopic friend. She knew he was inside her somewhere, she just didn't know where. "Well Tails, it's gonna take an age for you to get around in my body at this size! Looks like you're stuck in there!" she taunted joyfully. Little did she know Tails had entered her brain...
1533222222222222112111122122122211121.title: Destination: Brain!

The jetpack had done it's job. Tails had penetrated Rouge's brain at last. Sparing no time, he scanned the area high and low until he found a darkened patch of her brain. He landed on it and took his tools from his backpack. After some careful operating, he removed the black patch.

Rouge held her head. She felt extremely wierd. Her eyes became dazed and she wobbled on her feet. All the time she was constantly shrinking. She lay in the middle of the road, unconscious and at her normal size.

Tails had done it! Now for extraction! He had to leave Rouge's body... but how? And how would he return to his normal size if she'd digested his shrink ray? Tails was... stuck.

153322222222222211211112212212221112111.content:
"Oh no... I'm stuck this small..." Tails sobbed. "I'd better tell Rouge!"

He set off down a tunnel in Rouge's head. Eventually he had entered her ear canal. Being a bat, she'd have sensitive hearing, so Tails called to her. "Rouge! Rouge, can you hear me? It's me Tails! I'm in your ear!"

Rouge stirred and came to. She sat up groggily, rubbing her head. "Ugh... my head... and my stomach... Huh? Tails! You finally did it! Took you long enough!" she teased.

"Rouge, you don't wanna know where I've been..."

"Humour me."

"I went through your bloodstream til I was deposited in your large intestine. Then you digested my ship so I had to bail and travel backwards through your digestive system. You almost digested me when I was in your stomach. But you burped me out. I watched you eat my robot so I flew back into your belly to salvage parts, invented a jetpack and flew up your nose and into your brain. And now I'm stuck here!"
153322222222222211211112212212221112111.title: Contact!

"Sorry, what? MY fault? You're the one who made me turn into a voracious giant in the first place!" she countered.
"Rouge! Do you realise what this means?! It means I'm stuck inside you! Forever! Unless YOU can build another shrink ray, which isn't likely!" Tails shouted.

Rouge pondered for a moment...
1533222222222222112111122122122211121111.title: The Blame Game

1533222222222222112111122122122211121111.content:
"I like the sound of you being stuck in my body forever." she said.

Tails stopped. "Excuse me?"

"You could live inside me. You're certainly small enough."

Tails went to kick up a fuss but she interrupted again.

"I mean, you're not likely to survive in the outside world at that size and my body has everything you could need. You could even help me out by breaking up food in my stomach or helping my antibodies fight off invading germs." she adds.

Tails sits down, realising that what she says is right. She was his only hope of survival. He was now officially the first sentient inhabitant of Rouge's body. He stood and spoke back to Rouge.

"You're right Rouge, I'm in. Literally." he said.

Rouge smiled triumphantly. "Excellent! You know, you should be thankful. It is my fabulous body that you're going to be living in! Now, my microscopic friend, you're needed in my stomach. Get in there and start breaking down that stuff I ate."

"Yes Rouge!" Tails said purposefully.

Tails watched the glob of masticated food drop into her stomach. It sploshed into the acids and bubbled away visciously. "Yikes, I'd better not touch that Chili Dog. It's playing havoc with her digestion." Tails remarked, keeping his distance as more of the Chili Dog dropped into her stomach.

"I don't know," Tails replied bitterly. "I can't make a new size changing device like this, and it would take too long to teach you how to build one for me."

Rouge thought about this for a moment. "Hey why don't you live inside me? That way you won't have to worry about anything. I mean, it's not like anything could actually hurt you if you're in there, and this way you'll still be able to interact with people through me."

"...Alright, but where would I live exactly? It's not as if your body is packed with the furnishings of home."

Tails thought to himself and moved to the wall and managed to slide through the wall to a vein, and was immediately shoved down the vessel by the rushing bloodstream. Unfortunately for the young fox, he forgot one major fact. Blood has white blood cells that are "programmed" to kill any alien organisms in the blood. And that includes microscopic foxes. 1533222222222222112111122122122212.title: Head for the bloodstream

15332222222222221121111221221222122.content:
The white bloodcell was fairly large in comparison to Tails and matched up to any of Eggman's more formidable machines he'd faced. He knew Rouge's antibodies would try to eliminate him, so he had to find a way to escape. Twirling his tails as fast as he could, the tiny fox propelled himself along with the current in Rouge's bloodstream, hoping to evade his pursuer. Weaving in and out of bus-sized red blood cells, Tails had gained some incredible ground - though he'd probably only traveled a length of distance too small for Rouge to see.

More antibodies appeared in the distance and Tails realised he would soon be surrounded, so he would have to find another way to escape. With only one option left, he decided to leave the bloodstream by passing through the nearest wall. He left the hectic blood vessel and came out in a much larger place. He was still bound to be somewhere in Rouge's abdominal region and the smell confirmed that he had arrived in Rouge's bladder.

"I'm in completely the wrong place. Again! Ugh, I have to get out of here. I'd better go through the urinary tract to one of her kidneys and re-enter the bloodstream that way."

Tails flew out across a huge lake of urine and made his way up into one of the tunnels above, making his way to Rouge's right kidney. Once there, he took a short breather and went straight into Rouge's bloodstream again. He was caught in the current and carried along, seeing no sign of any antibodies yet. He knew they'd come for him eventually though. For now, it was fairly smooth sailing. More white blood cells arrived to eliminate the microscopic fox, but he managed to evade them for a while, before finally being forced to leave the bloodstream once again. He covered more ground this time and had managed to exit into Rouge's stomach.

The stomach was enormous and now Tails was trapped inside. He'd need to get creative if he wanted to get out of the bat's belly.

153322222222222222221.content:
Tails lead Rouge to two identical pods. "What is this?" Rouge said. "This will create a robotic copy of whoever steps inside it." Said Tails. "And why did you make a machine that could do that?" "Because I can." Rouge stepped inside a pod and it shut. Tails activated the machine and there was a bright flash inside the pod. Rouge covered her eyes as it scanned her, analyzed her features and brain.

In the other pod, Nanites began to form into a metal skeleton, then flesh and clothes formed around it. Rouge stepped out of the pod, so did her duplicate. "Rouge, meet Ro-1000." Said Tails. Ro-1000 looked exactly like Rouge. Rouge put a hand against her cheek. She felt so real!

"Well Tails, you did a good job copying me." Said Rouge. "But you'll never be able to best the original." "What are you talking about?" Said Ro-1000. "I don't just best you, I exceed you!" "As you can see, you share the same personality." Said Tails. "She knows everything you know. She can fight as well as you, and she even has some features you don't."

"Like what?" Said Rouge? "I'll show you." Said Ro-1000. Her eyes began to glow red. "Duck!" Yelled Tails. They both ducked as two lasers shot from RO-1000's eyes. They flew across the lab and burned a hole in the wall. "And that's just one of my tricks." Said Ro-1000, smirking.

"Can you fly?" Asked Rouge. "Of course." Jets activated on the bottom of Ro's feet. (I'm just gonna call her Ro now.) She flew up and hovered in the air. "Her metal skeleton makes her too heavy for her wings to fly." Explained Tails. "So she must use jet prepulsion. But, her wings are very sharp and can be used as weapons. She also has as much strength as Knuckles, and several other gadgets.

"Well, we know that your machine works, now what?" Said Rouge. "I was thinking of using her as a guard for my lab." Said Tails. "What!?" Said Ro. "I am not just some object for you to use as you please!" "I created you." Said Tails. "And I can destroy you. It's your choice."

"Hey Ro." Said Rouge. "How about we teach Shorty a lesson?" They both grinned. Next thing Tails knew, he was tied to a chair, with two bats grinning at him. "Let's test some of his inventions on him, and see how he likes it." Said Ro. "Or, we could make him give us the emerald, and then go after the master emerald. Together, Knuckles wouldn't stand a chance against us!" Said Rouge.
153322222222222222221.title: Ro-1000

1533222222222222222222112.content:
Once rouge noticed that it was past the 29 minutes Tails mentioned, she realized that she was doomed to a life of obesity. Something as life changing as this made Rouge furious. She would no longer be able to steal jewels, she can't fly,and she would always have to buy extra large clothes( speaking of which, Rouge's jumpsuit did survive her sudden expansion, but there were rips throughout the suit indicating that it won't last if she gains more weight.) and it was all Tails's fault. Describing her as pissed was an understatement. She charged towards Tails like a bull would charge at a matador.

Tails could see the rage in her eyes and quickly flew up to try and avoid her attack. Unfortunately, Rouge had managed to grab his feet. He tried to get away, but her grip on his leg was too strong. Soon she slammed Tails onto the ground, giving Tails a lot of bruises. His punishment wasn't over yet. Rouge than slammed her heavy body right on top of Tails.

"That's for ruining my life, you freak!" Rouge yelled as loud as she could, once she got off Tails

Too bad Tails couldn't hear this though. He was out like a light and completely defenseless. Rouge was tempted to kill him while he was asleep, until she noticed something interesting. Tails looked a little chubbier. He wasn't as fat as Rouge, but it was clear that he had gained at least 30 pounds in a few seconds.

It didn't take Rouge long to figure out that the virus Tails had given her was contagious. She didn't understand why Tails wasn't as fat as her, but she guessed that it was probably because she got a concentrated version of the virus while Tails wasn't as infected as she was. Even though he wasn't as fat as her, if what Tails said was accurate, he would have to gain weight without hope for a cure like her.

A sinister smirk appeared on Rouge's face as she imagined Tails suffering from the disease. Then even more sinister thoughts entered her head as she realized that she could infect anyone she wanted to! She could infect people that she despised, or use it to control people by threatening them with virus. Almost everyone would be afraid of a person that has a incurable virus that causes obesity, making Rouge a powerful threat to civilization.

Just then, Cream entered the lab. "Tails? I was hoping that you could help me with......" She saw the three animals on the floor. "Where is he? And why are all the animals running around?" Tails went up to her and started yipping, hoping she would understand.

But he couldn't speak in this form, and she couldn't understand a word he said. "What is it?" She bent down to the barking fox. Then she noticed it had two tails. "Tails!?" The fox nodded.

"Then those must be...." She looked at Blaze and Rouge. "How did this happen?" Then she noticed the De-anthrociser. She picked it up and stared at it. "So this thing turns animals into, well, animals?" Then she had an idea.

She looked at Tails. "You know Tails, I always wanted to keep you with me." She said. "To feed you, and pet you, and love you. So, I'll make you my new pet!"

Tails tries to back away, but she picks him up and holds him under her arm.Then does the same to Blaze and holds Rouge in her fist. "I might as well take you guys too."

She takes them back to her house. She puts Rouge in a cage with a blanket over it, and Blaze in a basket. Tails, shge lets sleep on her bed. "I'll be right back, I'm going to get you something to eat." She puts the De-anthrocizer on her dresser.

After she left, stuck her head out of the basket and began meowing angrily at Tails. Since they were both de-anthrocized, they could understand each other. "You've really done it this time Tails!" "I'm sorry!" I was only testing it on Rouge! I didn't intend for this to happen!"

"Well, we have to find help. We can't use the device since none of us has thumbs. So, tonight, I'll sneak out of the house and we can send Rouge out the window to find help."

That night, when Cream was asleep, Blaze crept over to Rouge's cage and picked the lock with a claw. Rouge flew out and they both went out the window.

"Okay Rouge come over here." Tails indicated an operating table with restraining harnesses on it. "Why, what are you going to do to me?" she asked. "I'm going to test a new anesthetic," Tails replied. "Well, that doesn't seem TO bad. But what are the straps for?"
"The straps are there to keep you from moving around to much in the event that something goes wrong." Rouge thinks about it for bit before agreeing. "Alright lets get you strapped in." says Tails. Once Rouge is fully restrained, Tails picks up a syringe filled with a bright blue fluid, and injects Rouge with the contents. "Well there doesn't seem to be any immediate side effects, so lets start the procedure." Tails said. "What procedure?" Rouge asks. "I'm going to remove your brain," Tails said in an offhand manner, as he examines a nearby tray for an appropriate tool. "WHAT!? BUT I THOUGHT YOU WERE JUST GOING TO TEST THE ANESTHETIC!" Rouge shouts. "I did say that. Now I need to see if it works. And I figured I could test some other things on your brain while I'm at it. Kill two birds with one stone, see?"
"But I don't want my brain removed!"
"Don't worry," Tails says in calming voice. "if the anesthetic works you'll be fine, and if it doesn't I can easily fix everything."
"What do you mean 'I'll be fine'?"
"Okay, see the 'anesthetic' is actually a colony of nanobots, designed to inhibit pain and keep the user alive. Even when your brain is diconnected, you'll still be able to see, and hear, and talk, and everything. Now if you don't mind i'd like to begin."
And with that Tails sets to work. After a few minutes the top of Rouge's head is stting on the operating table and her brain is in Tails' hand.
"See that wasn't so bad."
"Fine."
"Now lets get top of your head back on..."
After this is done Rouge asks, "So what are you going to Do with my brain?"
"I think I'll..."

I just remembered something that's perfect for this. I've got this really cool floating jar with cameras and stuff that you can keep it in." Tails takes Rouge to a room off to the side of his lab. It has a couch, some chairs around a table, a TV, and a kitchen. "Wait here while I go get it," he tells her. "I'm going to have to lock you in while I'm gone as security precaution. I'm sure you understand." And with that Tails leaves the room locking the only door behind him. Rouge walks around examining the room. 153322222222222222222222222111.content:
Rouge looks around the room for something to do, but she doesn't see anything that catches her interest. Soon her thoughts turn towards her brain. As hard as she tries, she just can't wrap her mind around the idea that this squishy wrinkly lump sitting in her hand is her. She feels slightly embarrassed as she realizes that it seems smaller than what a normal brain should be.

"Heh. I bet I'm the first person ever to be embarrassed by what their brain looks like," she says to herself. She sits down on the couch, and sets her brain down in front of her. She pokes it gingerly, and, not getting any strange feelings, giggles and pokes it again. The second time however is really more of a jab, and she accidentally knocks it on to the floor. Rouge flinches, waiting for it to hit the ground. However, instead of just landing with a splat, it bounces back up about three quarters of the table's height, making a slight squishing noise as it does so.

Rouge is transfixed by the spectacle, and doesn't get up to go after it until it comes to rest on the other side of the room. She quietly goes to pick it up, wondering if its bounciness has anything to do with the nanites. Holding it in her hand, she stares at it for a minute before...
153322222222222222222222222111.title: She starts fidgeting with her brain.

1533222222222222222222222221112.content:
Looking at her brain, Rouge notices that parts of it are now covered in dust from bouncing around on the floor. "Oh, ick! Doesn't Tails have robots to keep this place clean? Now my brain is all dirty..." She spots a washcloth over by the sink. "Yeah, I think I'll just go clean it off with that." She proceeded to wet the cloth, and then used it to wipe her brain clean. "Heh, brainwashing..." Rouge muttered to herself while she worked.

When she was all done, Rouge paused to admire her handiwork. She had managed to bring her brain to a polished shine, leaving it looking almost like some sort of bizarre piece of art. "There, all clean," Rouge said proudly, captivated by the sight. As she stared at her brain however, a strange desire came over her. "No... no that's disgusting, I shouldn't... On the other hand, it probably wouldn't do much more harm than rolling around on the floor, and I AM really curious..." Eventually, Rouge's curiosity got the better of her. She slowly raised her brain up to her mouth and, with some hesitation, gently licked it.

It was incredible! The feel of her brain on her tongue, a bit squishy and filled with creases, sent shivers down her spine. And the taste! She had never tasted anything like it before, and while it was very strange, it was at the same oddly enjoyable. "My Brain tastes delicious!" Rouge exclaimed, slightly overwhelmed at what had just happened. What next?
1533222222222222222222222221112.title: ...Licking it.

Suddenly, before she has the chance to realize what she's doing she begins to gently chew on her brain! However, instead of almost instantly disintegrating when she bites down on it, Rouge is pleasantly surprised to find that her brain is actually quite rubbery, almost like a chew toy. As she chews on her brain, Rouge thinks about how that could be possible. Were brains just naturally durable? Or was it the nanites that Tails had injected her with? Either way, Rouge was having a pretty good time, and hadn't even considered stopping. Eventually...

While Rouge is gnawing contentedly on her brain, she suddenly hears an odd squelching sound. She looks down at her brain, and finds to her initial horror, that a sizable chunk of it is missing! Well, not exactly missing. It's still in her mouth. Rouge immediately spits it out and it lands on the floor, bouncing away a little bit, before eventually coming to rest just underneath the couch.

While Rouge's initial reaction was to panic at having torn off part of her brain, she slowly realizes that she doesn't actually feel any different. She did a quick mental check and found that all of her memories were still there and that her emotional reactions remained unchanged. As she fishes the wayward brain chunk out from under the sofa she briefly wonders why that is, before filing it away as yet another product of the nanites.

Eventually, she pulls the little piece of her brain out from under the couch. After cleaning it off again, she stares at it, wondering what to do with it.

Rouge feverishly lines up the brain chunk with the gap it's absence created in her brain, then pushes it in. She holds it there for a few seconds before pulling her hand away.

Apparently what Tails said earlier about the nanites keeping things alive, also includes helping them heal. After a good minute or so, Rouge lets go of the chunk, and it stays in place, even shaking it doesn't dislodge it.

Letting out an audible sigh of relief she goes back to the chair and sits down.
Before long she's starting to get tempted to play with her exposed brain again though.
15332222222222222222222222211122211.title: Success! It's fused back into place!

choices: She seems perfectly fine so far.
She seems a bit dummer than before.
1533222222222222222222222221112222.content:
For a full minute, Rouge just stared at the chunk of her brain that she had accidentally torn off. It was a pretty sizable piece, maybe about an eighth of her brain. And yet, despite it's absence, she seemed to be perfectly fine.

Then, Rouge did something that, ordinarily, would have been unthinkable. Figuring that it probably wasn't important, given that it had been removed without causing any problems, she popped it into her mouth, and began chewing on it.

She savored the taste of the juices that her gnashing teeth squeezed from the little chunk, slowly dissolving it. Rouge shivered in pleasure from the odd sensation it left in her mouth. Once it had been reduced to a fine goop, she slowly and deliberately swallowed it, admiring the satisfying plop as it landed in her stomach.

Rouge had just eaten part of her own brain! Was she alright?
1533222222222222222222222221112222.title: She shrugs, pops it into her mouth, and swallow...

choices: She decides to throw caution to the wind at devour the rest anyway.
She decides to resist the urge to eat the rest of her succulent brain.
15332222222222222222222222211122221.content:
Rouge patted her stomach in a highly satisfied manner. That chunk of her brain had been really filling. She wondered briefly why she hadn't been unduly affected by the loss of that bit of her mind, but decided not to dwell on it.

"Now," Rouge said to herself as she picked up the rest of her brain. "What to do with this tasty little morsel?" On the one hand, Rouge had deeply enjoyed devouring that little chunk of her brain, and currently longed for nothing more than to finish the rest of her brain off. On the other hand, she had no idea why she hadn't been affected by the piece's loss, and sanity suggested it might be a bad idea to just chow down on her remaining grey matter.
15332222222222222222222222211122221.title: She seems perfectly fine so far.

choices: Nope, skull is still empty. Better hope the prosthetic works corectly.
looks like something's in there already.
153322222222222222222222222111222211.content:
After a few moments of staring at what remained of her brain, Rouge shrugged. Her own flawed logic telling her that she obviously didn't need it anymore, and completely disregarding the possibility that her brainless state might not be permanent, at which point she would need as much of her brain as possible back.

Throwing caution to the wind she tore off another chunk and popped it into her mouth, slowly chewing her way through it, delighting in the delicious flavor and unique texture. Once it had been reduced to paste and swallowed she couldn't help but chuckle, how many beings could say the best thing they'd ever tasted had been their own brain? Next she popped the brain stem and cerebral cortex off the back, leaving about half her brain behind. These pieces weren't folded in on themselves the same way as the others and had a stringier chewier texture to them. A somewhat different flavor too. Apparently only the outer cortices of the lobes had the flavor she first noticed, the other parts each had similar but subtly different flavors thanks to the different endorphins, hormones, and other chemicals running through them - though rouge likely wouldn't understand that particular detail - and was each delicious in it's own way. Rouge took her time, enjoying each and every one of the the delectable morsels, and was almost disappointed when she finished the last one.

Just in time for tails to return, and ask where her brain was...

- - - - -

"You did WHAT?! Rouge, the nano-machines only have a battery life of eight hours, what do you think happens to you when that runs out and your skull is still empty?!" Tails shouted, causing his now very frightened patient to back away. She had really done it this time...

Taking a moment to calm down before walking over and unlocking the door back to the main part of the lab, the special jar and an odd black metal 'ball' under one arm.

"You're just lucky the purpose of the experiment compensates for that." Tails grumbles, letting out an exasperated sigh. The fox shakes his head and runs a palm down his face. His frustration at his tests potentially leading to Rouges death, weighing heavily on his mind. He couldn't focus on that, not while he still had time to try and save her. "The point of taking it out, wasn't just testing the nanobots, I also planned to test the installation of a prosthetic computer brain."

Setting down the storage jar and walking over to her, Tails lays one hand on her shoulder and starts leading her back to the operating table.
"Alright, lets get you back onto the table, if you're lucky, the nanobots might have reconstituted what you ate. I doubt it though, they weren't programmed to do that..."
153322222222222222222222222111222211.title: Delicious delicious brains.
