Taking a look inside rouge's skull once he gets it open, the fox shakes his head before silently getting to work.
Rouge watches him through a nearby mirror, as the fox deftly links the minuscule filaments of her spinal cod to an indent on one side of the ball, then running a circuit out from the ball to the base of each ear. Lastly her eyes blink off then back on, one then the other as they connect.

"alright, done. The readings look... okay, i guess? i was kinda hoping to have the organic one to compare as a baseline for this part." Tails explains as he closes Rouge's head up, anoyance having given way to concern, "How are you feeling?"

"That's me now..." rouge comments, everything finally sinking in, "a computer the size of a marble inside an empty-headed bat..."

1533222222222222222222222222121221.content:
Afterwards, Rouge looked down. Instead of her well-endowed winged body, she saw Tails' brown-furred, two-tailed body. "Hey, it worked!" she said.

"Not the way you and I thought," she heard Tails say.

Rouge turned to him, saying, "What do you- Oh." In front of her was Tails' fox head on her bat body. "Then that means-" She looked at a mirror and saw that her head was on Tails' body. "Huh."

"Okay, my machine swaps heads, not bodies," Tails wrote down in his notepad. "I suggest we test out our new forms before reverting back to normal."

"I agree," Rouge said as she tried to have her new two tails spin around so she could fly. "Come on, come on." She could not be able to use those tails properly. "Darn it, Tails, these aren't as doable as my wings."

"I could say the same about those, Rouge," Tails said, also having difficulty with flapping Rouge's wings.

"Hey, Tails!"

The two-tailed fox snapped out of his thoughts as his adoptive brother and hero entered the room; Sonic grinned at him, but frowned upon spotting his guest.

"What're you doing here, Rouge?"

Before anything could happen, Tails jumped between the two.

"She's helping me, Sonic! She agreed to help test some of my inventions!"

Sonic eyed the bat somewhat distrustfully, but finally relented. A lightbulb came on in the back of Tails' mind.

"Wait a minute, Sonic!" he cried. "We need another helper, and you'd be perfect!"

"Oh, yeah?" the blue blur chuckled "What do you need me to do?"

Tails pointed out the empty stool.

"Just sit here and put that helmet on."

"You mean like this?" asked Sonic, as he followed the instructions.

"Perfect..." smiled Tails as he flicked the switch.

1533222222222222222222222222122122221.content:
"You know," said Rouge, "I'd like to try swapping bodies with that human friend of yours; Chris, I think was his name?"

"Are you sure about that?" asked Tails.

"Oh, yes," replied Rouge. "I've been curious to know what it's like be boy and being a human. If I were to swap with Chris, I would know both at once."

"Alright, I'll give him a call," said Tails and picked up the telephone and dialed the number to the Thorndyke family's estate.

After explaining to Chris about the deal he had made with Rouge and assuring him that the body swapping would be only temporary, Chris was willing to help and he arrived at Tails' workshop in less than ten minutes.

After exchanging greetings with both Rouge and Tails, Chris was shown to the chair that needed to sit on in order for the swap to work. There was a helmet that he needed to put on too. Once both Chris and Rouge had put on the helmets, Tails started the machine.

When it turned on, both Rouge and Chris felt as if they were going through the pipe of a vacuum cleaner, before coming to an abrupt stop.

Now; did something go wrong with the swapping, or was it successful?

Tails was thinking about who he was going to swap Rouge with when he heard a familiar voice greeting him.

"Hello, Mr. Tails!"

"Hi, Cream!" Tails said. "What brings you here?"

You'll be a genius and all this will be yours. It'll be a shame that you won't be the one appreciating it." His hands began to sink into her wrists as she struggled against him, growling. "Get off me! Stop it! I never agreed to this!"

"Its a bit late for that now, Rouge. Stop struggling, it'll be more comfortable for us both if you do." She cried out as Tails thrust his head into her neck as she gasped, eyes going wide as her body stopped responding. She groaned, beginning to black out as Tails melded the rest of the way into her. She began twitching on the floor as Tails began melding with her completely. She soon got up, groaning and smiling as she looked herself over.

"Ahhh... It... It worked!" She smiled, stretching slowly as she winced lightly... She opened her mouth, groaning as she said...

15332222222222222222222222222111.content:
She cried out, gripping her forehead with her palm as she shook it. "This isn't what... I meant..." She growled as something began visibly moving under her skin as she gripped the table, falling to her knees, a smirk coming across her face.

"It won't be that simple, Rouge... My nervous system is linking into yours, merging with it, overriding it... Its entirely reversible, but..."

She winced again, gasping as her eyes went cloudy. "Why... Ahh... Are you doing this...? Why am I... Beginning to... Enjoy it...? No, its my body, my mind, I..."

She chuckled again. "I'm doing it because I never know if I should trust you... Now I am you... And you're enjoying it because I am... And my thoughts are becoming yours..." She blinked, sighing as she held her head, brushing herself off.

"In fact, why am I even talking to myself...?" She chuckled a bit, sighing as she looked herself over. "Not too bad, if I don't say so myself... I'll have to thank Tails for the Chaos Emerald sometime... When he's not busy being me." She giggled a bit at what she said... He was having a bit of fun, pretending to be her...

"You know, this isn't as bad as I thought it'd be. I mean, I'm smarter... I have access to all of his things... And I'm less of a treasure hungry bitch. Who cares about the Chaos Emerald, I have everything he was planning on testing on me." She chuckled. "I'm glad Tails decided to be me, I think this'll work out for the best." She smiled. The way things were going, it was getting harder to tell if it was really Tails or Rouge in control now...

After continuing this rhetorical exchange for a few minutes, he began to wonder what he wanted to do now that he had Rouge's body all to himself. He alwayds wondered what it was like to be a girl, and being Rouge seemed to be a great opportunity to see the world in a new light. He could even mess with his friends or possess them too. Then again, there were so many inventions that he had made that he wanted to try out (so many that the author of this story no longer wants to have a laundry list of inventions). As Rouge, he would be perfectly ssafe from any harmful effects since he could deactivate the power of the gloves and return to his former self if the need arised. What to do. What to do.

He figured that he could decide to live as her whenever he wanted and he could release her just as easily. Until then, there were inventions to test, and it was much safer to use another body to test them with.
1533222222222222222222222222211112.title: Tails must attend to his inventions.

153322222222222222222222222221112.content: "So it looks like I'm still in control" Rouge said. "Not quite, my friend," she replied to herself. "Tails? Is that you?" "Yes it is. And I'm not done merging yet. Right now all I can do is talk using your mouth. But in a few weeks time, I will be in full control. In the meantime, I will be here, reading your memories like a book. Making irresistible suggestions. Thinking your thoughts for you while you sleep. And the best part? You won't even be able to realize when you've lost control, your mind unable to identify precisely when you became me. Now, how about you help me with more experiments?" "S-Sure..." Rouge replied.
153322222222222222222222222221112.title: Rouge is in control, but her actions and though...

1533222222222222222222222222211121.content: How about a reality warping remote?
1533222222222222222222222222211121.title: More experiments.

choices: Go to Rouge's apartment and explore her life
Tell all his friends that he was her...  Or at least not to worry he was gone.
1533222222222222222222222222211122.content:
As the weeks went by, Rouge began testing less and less of the experiments and developing more and more of them. She had even stopped minding the testing, partially because now that Tails was inside her, he asked her to do less dangerous ones... And also because it was now starting to feel like it was her idea to do them in the first place. Her first time in the shower while he was like this, she had found herself enjoying herself far more than she usually would as well... And in some of the final days... She wasn't really sure if it was because Tails wanted to prove his control, or if she had just stopped caring, but she had dressed in a much lighter, more revealing outfit... It was a hot day after all, and her jumpsuit had gotten to be a pain on those days... Eventually, she stopped and blinked a couple times, smirking to herself as she stretched.

"Mmmmmm... Finally, its done... Well, it was as good as done a week ago, but she still had her own thoughts then..." She giggled, Tails in full control now. With all of Rouge's thoughts, memories and personality, able to be accessed on a whim. "Of course, I could release her whenever I want... But this way I still keep my promise... The Chaos Emerald is mine... So its hers." She smirked, sighing as she wondered what she should do first...
1533222222222222222222222222211122.title: A few weeks later.

choices: Enter the room and take Amy or wait for the others
Why take one of his subjects?  Take Tails and his inventions.
1533222222222222222222222222212.content:
"I have a couple subjects in mind for you to merge into... I'll allow you to decide who." He smiled as Rouge put on the gloves, nodding lightly as she smirked, an evil thought going through her mind as Tails revealed a waiting room with a one-way mirror window, Amy sitting inside of it as she frowned.

"I haven't told her what I plan on doing, but this test would just be temporary anyway... Others will be arriving soon, if you want to wait."

Rouge nodded as she powered on the gloves...
1533222222222222222222222222212.title: Handed the gloves to Rouge

15332222222222222222222222222121.content: "So, which will it be?" Tails asked. "Do you want to possess Amy, or wait for someone else?"
15332222222222222222222222222121.title: Enter the room and take Amy or wait for the others

choices: Rouge only has influence at first and has to wait for full control
153322222222222222222222222221211.content:
Rouge walked gently over to the room, opening the door and entering it as Amy blinked, looking at Rouge.

"Oh, are you here to help Tails, too?" She asked Rouge as she nodded, walking closer to her.

"You could say that, yeah..." Rouge chuckled before leaping forward, hands outstretched as she grasped Amy firmly with her hands, the gloves beginning to do their job as Amy gasped, about to say something but unable to from the strange sensations being forced upon her body as Rouge's hands sunk inside of her body. As Rouge began sinking inside, Amy groaned, shaking her head as she tried to push Rouge away, but found her stuck close... She finally managed to get some words out as she screamed.

"Stop it! Stop it, what are you doing?! I..." Rouge was already chest-deep in her now as she began to become light headed. She slumped in her chair as Rouge squirmed the rest of the way into her. After a bit, Amy's eyes opened as she held her head. "Ohhh... What... Just happened, I..."
153322222222222222222222222221211.title: Amy.

1533222222222222222222222222212111.content:
"...I feel so..." Amy stopped. Tails watched curiously as she slowly lowered her hands from her head. "...so innocent." She said looking up with seductive grin."It feels so exhilarating! I haven't felt this way in ages." She stated examining her body. From Tails' perspective it was very clear that Rouge had successfully taken control of Amy's body, but he had to be sure."Rouge? Is that you?" He asked feeling stupid." Of course it's me! And I'm loving it in here!" She answered hugging herself. This was a great achievement, the gloves actually worked he was half expecting them to just trap Rouge under Amy's skin, literally.

Now that the initial phase of the gloves test was over it was time for the second part." Rouge." She didn't hear him she was to busy posing infront of a mirror she found in his pile of inventions."I still think you would look better with a more mature wardrobe Pinkie." Rouge said to her host body."ROUGE!" Shouted Tails startling the bat in a hedgehod's body." What!?" She said giving him a disapproving scowl crossing her arms."Sorry to cut your fun short but now we have to see if you can leave Amy's body." He said making her scowl deepen.

He was asking her to leave the body she was enjoying so much.
She didn't want to but if she refused he wouldn't give her the Chaos Emeral. Thinking it over she responded.
1533222222222222222222222222212111.title: Rouge takes full direct control

153322222222222222222222222221212.content: "Nah."Said Rouge brushing off the idea of possessing Amy."She's not 'mature' enough for me. I want someone more my style."Tails sighed anticipating that this would take awhile."Alright Rouge how about..."
153322222222222222222222222221212.title: Someone else.

choices: Have amy test the glove on HER.
15332222222222222222222222222122.content:
"Sorry Tails, but I think I'd rather possess you!" Rouge exclaims, running at Tails, gloved hands outstretched. Bizarrely, Tails made no move to defend himself, or even get out of the way. He didn't even seem worried about what Rouge was about to do. Rouge should have been suspicious about this, but she was to eager to notice. She grabbed him with the gloves and...

ZAAAPPP!

Rouge was sent flying backwards by the force of the electric charge. Reeling, she tried to steady herself, with little success. "What HAPPENED?" she asked, still dazed. "Tut. You didn't really think I hadn't foreseen the possibility of your betrayal did you? The gloves are designed to deliver a powerful electric shock in the event that the wearer tries to possess me. And since you tried to attack me, I think some retribution is in order, don't you?"

Rouge tried to run away, but before she could, the ceiling opened up, and a number of mechanical arms appeared and restrained her. "Now," said Tails, "What shall I do with you?"
15332222222222222222222222222122.title: Why take one of his subjects?  Take Tails and h...

choices: "Did you really think Amy could take me over?"
153322222222222222222222222221221.content:
Tails just smiled as he walked over to Rouge, yanking the gloves off her hands. "I rather think you need a new disposition on life... Something more cheerful. Oh, I know just what to do..." He pressed a button on a remote he pulled off a nearby table, the door to the observation room unlocking as he spoke into it. "Amy, I'm ready for you... You can go ahead and leave that room."

She blinked, a little confused as she came out, walking along the workshop floor as she saw Rouge tied up like that. "Oh my gosh! What happened?"

"Rouge tried to do something to me... So I figured I should give you the opportunity to do it to her." He handed her the gloves. "How would you like to try being her?"

Amy's eyes lit up at that, taking off her own gloves and putting on Tails' as Rouge growled, the tendrils moving to gag her as well as she was about to scream out several things...

"So... How do these work?" She asked as she got closer to Rouge.

Tails chuckled. "Just put your hands on her, and the gloves draw you inside. They'll do all the work for you." She nodded at those instructions as Amy put her hands on Rouge's head. Rouge's mind immediately went fuzzy as she groaned, her eyesight going blurry as Amy giggled. "I've always wondered what it'd be like to be you..." Was the last thing Rouge heard as Amy's hands slid into her head. Her body would be curling back from the strange sensations, and she would be screaming... But the tendrils were just too tight on her body... She continued to twitch and groan as Amy sank into her completely, Tails watching and making notes. Soon, Rouge's eyes opened once again, a tendril moving away from her mouth so she could speak... And she said:
153322222222222222222222222221221.title: Have amy test the glove on HER.

1533222222222222222222222222212211.content:
She smirked, squirming and shaking her head lightly as she felt Amy crawling around in her head. "I mean, come on, Tails..."

He just smiled and said simply. "Sonic." As Rouge's eyes lit up, grinning as she looked around. "Where? Where's my darli......" She winced, shaking her head and growling. "No, no no!" Tails smiled lightly

"Yes, I'm afraid so, Rouge. Amy appears to be making herself at home... It could take a few weeks... Or a few hours depending on how badly she wants to use your body to get Sonic." He winked as she squealed at that.

"You really think he'll like me like this?" She smiled, the smile not fading for a good while before Rouge groans, struggling once again. "No, no, I... I won't let her, I..."
1533222222222222222222222222212211.title: "Did you really think Amy could take me over?"

choices: Amy can't separate herself from Rouge.
1533222222222222222222222222212212.content:
Tails was impressed. He had thought that Rouge might have put up a little more resistance, but his technology had surpassed her consciousness entirely. Tails watched as Amy began examing herself in front of a ful body mirror, making sure that the bountiful body she now possessed was really all hers to enjoy. Once she was completely satisfied, Amy gave Tails a hug so tight he thought he might have exploded. She quickly realized that Tails was practically choking and released him, allowing him to catch his breath.

"Oh, sorry, Tails," Amy said. "I forgot that Rouge is much stronger than I was in my own body."

Tails got up quickly. "It's fine. I'm just glad that the gloves worked without any apparent flaws. Since this was the first tie they were tested, I wasn't sure what to expect."

Amy nodded, quickly glancing back into the mirror with a delayed surprise that it was no longer her own reflection in that mirror. She took a look at her new hands, covered by the possession gloves instead of Rouge's own. "So, am I permanently in Rouge's body? Or can I leave her at anytime?"

Tails paused. He had designed the gloves so that the wearer could easily possess and depossess the host body. Now was a good time to see if the gloves worked to ull capacity. "I designed the gloves so that you could easily leave the subject body whenever you felt like it. Why don't you try it now? Just try concentrating on leaving Rouge."

Amy closed her eyes and conentrated on following Tails' instructions.
1533222222222222222222222222212212.title: The Gloves Work Perfectly

choices: Tails decides to take up Amy's suggestion.
Tails decides to possess Rouge and continue testing his inventions.
15332222222222222222222222222122121.content:
Amy focused on becoming herself again, a moan escaping her lips as hands from under Rouge's skin began to press forward. Her focus became stronger, corresponding with the appearance of her own arms escaping Rouge's. Soon the rest of her body began to show, as if she were pushing herself out of the bat's body. Finally, her face emerged from Rouge's, the rest of her head soon following. As soon as Amy completely separated herself from Rouge, both girls collapsed, Rouge out of the exhaustion of being possessed and Amy out of the exhaustion of separating herself from her host.

Tails caught Amy and proceeded to give her a full examination with a medical device he had made a few hours back. Everything seemed to be in order physically, but he would quickly need to evaluate her mental state. After securing Rouge to make sure she wouldn't try anything if she woke up soon, he turned his attention to the unconcsious pink hedgehog. "Hey, Amy!" he shouted as he shook her body. "Wake up!"

He stuck his head closer to her body to hear an increased amount of activity, signalling that she would wake up soon. After a few minutes, Amy woke up to see Tails occupied on entering information into a computer before he looked up to see if she was up. He motioned her to walk over and promptly began asking her various questions to make sure that there was no damage done from the experience. Once he was satisfied with the results, he asked for the gloves back. She hesitated for a moment, and Tails noticed that.

"Something wrong Amy?"

She looked him in the eye and said, "Well, I kind of wanted to use Rouge's body for a little bit longer..."

Tails's eyes narrowed. "How come?"

"Well, it was a cool experience to walk in someone else's shoes and be a part of such a scientific achievement..."

"This is about Sonic, isn't it?"

Amy sighed. "Alright, yes. I just felt more confident being Rouge, and I thought he might like that..."

Tails put a finger over her mouth, indicating that he had something to say. "Amy, the reason Sonic keeps avoiding you is the way you try to approach him. By getting all flustered and trying far too hard, you're selling yourself short. If you keep a cooler head, I'm sure he'd give a meaningful relationship with you a try."

Amy looked stunned when Tails finished speaking but then realized that his words made sense. "How come you're trying to help me out on this? Not that I'm complaining, but I thought you, as his best friend, would be the one who respected his wishes the most."

"It's because I'm his best friend that I want him to have a meaningful relationship, especially with a wonderful girl like you. Besides, I think you two would make such a cute couple."

Amy blushed at Tails's words and gave him a hug that made a rosy tint appear on his own cheeks. "Alright, then. Here are the gloves back." She took off the gloves and gave them to him. "So, what are you going to do with them now?"

Tails thought for a moment. "I obviously can't trust Rouge to do experiments willingly. So, maybe I'll use the gloves myself."

Amy pursed her lips together for a moment. "Or, maybe you could help me out a bit with Sonic?"

Tails raised his eyebrows in a questioning manner. "What did you have in mind?"

"Well, I'm afraid that I might not be able to get a date, at least at first. You know him better than anyone else, so...would you be willing to warm him up to the idea?"

"Hmmm, I guess I could put in a good word for you, but I'm not sure if that would be enough..."

Amy sighed before another idea came into her head. "I'm kinda afraid of screwing up if I tried to ask him out myself. Maybe you could do it for me?"

Tails frowned. "Are you asking me to use these gloves on you and then ask Sonic out?"

Amy gave a sheepish grin, confirming Tails's conjecture. "Just this once, please?"

Tails thought about the situation. He wanted to test the gloves for himself, and the idea of being either Amy or Rouge excited him. He wanted Amy to be able to get a relationship with Sonic going by herself, but perhaps his experience with Sonic could make the difference between Sonic flatly running off and Sonic sticking around to give her a chance. Amy was willing to be on both sides of his experiment, and he felt like helping her out a bit. However, he also wanted to ensure that Rouge didn't try anything funny. He needed his inventions tested, and Rouge was unwilling to do it herself. Even with the promise of the Chaos Emerald, she attempted to betray him and keep it all to herself. He had to ensure nothing like that happened again and get those experiments tested. By becoming her, he would kill two birds with one stone. What does Tails ultimately decide to do?
15332222222222222222222222222122121.title: Amy successfully leaves Rouge's body.

153322222222222222222222222221221211.content:
As Tails thought about it again, he began to think that it would be much better to take up Amy's offer than to stay in the lab. With both her and Rouge, he would see for himself what it was like using the gloves, and he would be able to see whatever differences there might be if he used it rather than Amy. From there, though, he felt that being Amy would be far better than being Rouge. For one thing, he didn't really want much to do with Rouge after her betrayal. If he was going to possess her in order to make sure she wouldn't try to fool him again, he'd have to be her permanently. Amy, on the other hand, he’d be helping to give her the one thing she truly wanted but hadn’t been able to obtain. He’d also be getting Sonic to stop his often childlike attempts to get away from her and to actually give love a chance. Furthermore, he wondered if there was any difference being invited would make. When Amy used the gloves on Rouge, it was clear that the simple refusal from Rouge made her entry look rather tough to go through, let alone the exit. Amy, however, was inviting him to use her body, an opportunity that he was sure he would probably not get again.

“Alright, Amy,” Tails finally said. “I’ll do it,”

She smiled. “Great!”

“First, though, I have to do something about Rouge.” He walked towards the central console of his lab and pressed a few buttons. A hatch opened up nearby, and a replica of Tails soon appeared. It appeared to be an android, given the robotic parts evident in parts of it. He turned to Amy for a moment. "This is an android I made of myself. I copied Eggman's schematics for his Shadow Androids and altered it to make this one!"

Tails flipped a switch, and the android activated. “Tails Android Unit 1 primed and ready!” it exclaimed in a voice that mimicked the original’s well. “What are your commands, Creator?”

“Well, as you can see, I have a lot of inventions that I need to test. I want you to test as many of them as you can on Rouge, but try not to use potentially dangerous ones. Keep her restrained so she doesn’t escape. Continue to test all the inventions until I get back. Understood?”

The android tilted its head for a moment before raising it again. “Orders understood, Creator!”

It saluted to Tails, who returned it before it went off to select a suitable invention. He then turned to Amy. “Alright, Amy,” he said as he put the gloves on. “Are you ready?”

She nervously nodded. “A little bit nervous but otherwise yes.”

“You know you don’t have to do this, right?”

“Yeah…but I still want to go through with it.”

Tails nodded and activated the gloves. He made contact with her back and felt himself being drawn in. Amy seemed to shudder a bit but maintained a brave face. As Tails disappeared further, Amy’s shaking subsided. Once he completely vanished, her body completely relaxed while standing up. Her eyes opened, but it was Tails who was now seeing through them.

“Whoa!” he said in his new voice. “This is incredible!” The mirror reappeared as he checked his new body out. He was soon fully satisfied that the gloves worked to perfection. “Well, no time to waste!” He then headed out in search of Sonic.
153322222222222222222222222221221211.title: Tails decides to take up Amy's suggestion.

choices: Continue as planned and look for Sonic
Take a detour and have some fun as Amy! She'll think it was her idea!
1533222222222222222222222222212212111.content:
Being in control of Amy's body was an exhilarating experience. Seeing everything from this new perspective, everything felt new again. Tails stretched out Amy's limbs, giving a gentle coo with her voice. It was difficult to explain how he now felt... It was like... Amy was still there, still the one doing the things her body was doing... But he was simply her, in every sense of the word. He knew what she knew, know how she would act, how she would feel... And did so as easily as being himself. He could see why being Rouge had given Amy such a confidence! Amy had filled Rouge's consciousness and felt the way Rouge did... As he now did with Amy.

'Amy' made her way back to the train to Station Square, where she always seemed to bump into Sonic, Tails easily falling into her mindset. It was very much like his will acted as a guide to Amy's consciousness, their thoughts and perceptions now one, but Amy would likely feel as if everything he did as her was her own idea.

*All the better* He thought to himself, the thought taking on Amy's tone without him even trying. *This way I...* He trailed off. His thoughts couldn't think of 'himself' as Tails. Only as Amy. Tails was somebody exterior, someone different from Amy. Her mind couldn't think this way, think of herself as Tails, so he could not force hers to. *This way once Tails leaves me, I'll know exactly how to make sure Sonic still likes me.* Tails continued his and Amy's thought, smiling to herself.

It was a couple hours on the train before she got back to Station Square as she just walked around, Tails quickly getting accustomed to Amy's body and way of thinking. He couldn't completely change the way she thought, but he could push her in the right direction, as long as he could come up with a reason Amy's mind accepted. *Tails'll have to remember that for when he becomes Rouge...* She pondered, feeling a strange pang of jealousy at the thought. Why was she jealous of... *Of course I'm jealous Tails gets to be Rouge.* She thought in a sudden tone of realization. *Its because I'm not Tails, he's just... Driving me.* Tails continued experimenting with controlling Amy's thoughts, seeing where the barrier between his thoughts and hers were, what all he could get away with as her... Without crossing a line, of course... Or would he?
1533222222222222222222222222212212111.title: Follow Tails as Amy.

choices: "I want you to be me forever!"
"I want to thank you... Go ahead and get Rouge now."
15332222222222222222222222222122121111.content:
Amy squirmed a bit, rubbing her arm and blushing... Tails promised he'd help her get a date with Sonic, and here she was, thinking about everything but. It was always hard to get Sonic's attention, but with Tails driving her thoughts, it was much easier to find him than usual. She now knew all of his normal hangouts, and where it'd be most likely to 'accidentally' bump into him. After about an hour of hanging around one of the city's Chili Dog stands, there he was, getting about 10 on a platter. She took a deep breath, nodding to herself... Tails would steer her right, help her say what needed to be said...

She got into line behind Sonic to get one of the chili dogs for herself, not approaching him yet. Once she had one of her own, she sat down at his table. "Mind if I sit down here?" She asked with a grin as Sonic blinked.

"Uhhhh... Sure, I guess. What's up, Amy...?" He seemed a bit put off, but pleasantly so, at Amy's unusual restraint. She just gave a smile and blushed.

"Nothing much... I was in the area and saw you sitting down for dinner, so I thought I'd join you... We never really find the time to just... Talk. You're always running off so quickly, and I just... I try so hard because of how fast you run. I know you don't want to stick around too long, but it'd be nice if we could just take a little time and talk about more than the new plot you have to go and stop..."

Sonic just gave a chuckle and a smile at that. This was a side of her he hadn't seen... Normally she was trying to cling all over him by now. She was being fairly calm and composed. They sat there and talked for a while, about the weather, about Amy's new apartment and about Sonic's new running shoes that Tails had designed. Sonic actually stayed there for much longer than he normally would, enjoying Amy's company. It was... Weird. Something was different about her now. He saw her in a whole new light now.

"Anyway, its been nice talking to you, Sonic... Hey, would you like to... To maybe go out and do something together? It wouldn't have to be a date, it could be just as friends, but... I would like it to be a date." She gave a blush as Sonic scratched the back of his head, embarrassed.

"I, uhhh... Well... Sure, why not? Tomorrow at 7, OK?" He gave her a hug as Amy froze up, smiling as he dashed off. She stood there, frozen for about a minute before she came to her senses and went back to her apartment. She closed her eyes, concentrating on Tails separating from her as his hands began to make hers bulge... And he slowly left her body with a gasp. Amy collapsed, but was still conscious this time, tingling all over and cooing.

"Tails, that was... I... I couldn't tell that was you! I mean... I knew you were in me, and I knew you would be leading my thoughts... But it all felt like me! I..."
15332222222222222222222222222122121111.title: Continue as planned and look for Sonic

153322222222222222222222222221221211111.content:
It was a bright, shining morning as Amy Rose woke up feeling as energetic and excited as always. Technically, she quietly mused, it wasn't just Amy in that room. Several years earlier, Tails had agreed to help her get Sonic to be her boyfriend by possessing her body in order to do and say just the right things to get him interested. The experience with the gloves, however, had changed both him and Amy. For Amy, she still felt like she was completely in control of herself, just with a new personality that she loved. For Tails, he loved the experience so much that he had felt like he simply was her, an experience that nearly prevented him from separating from her body after he had successfully gotten a first date with Sonic. As Amy had made the confession that she wanted Tails to be her forever, he was all to eager to oblige. Of course, Tails couldn't just simply hop into Amy's body again. His disappearance would be suspicious, as would Rouge's. However, he had a solution to these problems.

Tails had made a cloning machine and used it to make two clones of himself that he could program. The first was to act completely as himself, having only the data from the experiments as proof of their occurrence. The second was to take over Rouge with a second pair of gloves he had quickly fashioned. That clone was to act like Rouge but still have his own traits and memories driving her once the possession had occurred so that another scenario of Rouge trying to take over the lab would not happen. Needless to say, both clones had executed their roles perfectly, not even acknowledging to themselves or to the original that any change had taken place. After finally tying up those loose ends, Tails donned the first set of gloves once more and re-entered Amy's body, the sensation of becoming her even more powerful than the first time. As Tails' body physically disappeared, Amy's awoke with her eyes a shimmering sky blue before settling down to their normal green. A smile of complete ecstasy crossed her face as Tails' change was finally complete, this time knowing that the beautiful girl in the mirror was truly him for good.

She shook herself from those thoughts of the past. All that really mattered was that she was Amy Rose, happily in a relationship with the heroic Sonic. She dressed herself slowly, still enjoying every second but also very eager for the day ahead. She had another date with Sonic, which might involve anything from dinner to a nice restaurant to crushing Eggman's latest scheme for world domination. For all she knew, it might be the day he finally proposed to her, something that any outsider might have deemed impossible several years earlier. As she finally finished and got ready to go out, she spared one last thought about Tails, wondering how he was managing the lab in the original's stead. She quickly brushed it off, though. She was happy, and she had absolutely no regrets.
153322222222222222222222222221221211111.title: Several years later...

choices: "I trust you. Feel free to be me again."
153322222222222222222222222221221211112.content:
Although a part of Tails said that it would be a good idea to follow through with his earlier plan, the majority of him told him it was a bad idea. "You know Amy," Tails started, "being you made me realize a big design flaw with the gloves."

He saw the expected puzzled look on Amy's face. "Huh? What's that?"

"I think they work a bit too well. You see, when I was in your body, I eventually felt like I was completely you. That Tails was someone other than me and that I had always been you. The only thing that got me to remember I wasn't actually you was the hug from Sonic. While it probably felt good to you, it caused me to feel very uncomfortable because I'm Sonic's best friend, definitely not his girlfriend. Without that happening, I might not have been able to separate myself from you. Now, if that were to happen with Rouge, I'd end up allowing something dangerous to happen instead of preventing it. I need to modify these gloves a bit so that I'll stay in complete control without causing my mind to change."

Amy nodded in understanding and helped Tails gather supplies he needed to fix the gloves. About an hour later, he was finished. "That should do it!"

"So, what's going to happen now?" Amy asked.

"Well, I need to make sure these gloves will work fine. Would you care to help me test them?"

"How so? Are you going to use them on me again?"

"That's the first choice. I'd be able to feel the differences with the gloves myself and make adjustments as necessary. Still, I already had the opportunity to be you. It would only be fair to give you the chance to be me."

Amy considered this offer. Being Rouge was an amazing sensation, but she was curious about what it was like to be a guy. Although she trusted Tails, she wasn't sure if she wanted to be possessed with the altered gloves. Then again, maybe Tails would be able to lend a helping hand for that date with Sonic. After thinking for a while, she finally gave an answer.
153322222222222222222222222221221211112.title: Tails has another suggestion...

choices: See if the possession gloves can be used on another person
Give Tails the night of his life before he became Rouge
15332222222222222222222222222122121112.content:
She looked at her hand, the glove which enabled Tails to have crawled into her body now worn on her own. She wasn't sure who prompted the thought, but she did know this... If those gloves were now on her hands... Perhaps she could use them as well? She squirmed at even the thought of the possibility... Perhaps she need not be jealous at Tails for getting to be the one to become Rouge... They could share her. Tails was driving Amy, and then it could be possible for herself to be the one driving Rouge... It'd all still be Tails in control. Or, perhaps instead, she could try this out on somebody else. Just to try it out, before Tails got to work on getting herself and Sonic together.

On the other hand, there was so much Tails could now experience, now that he was in her body, and it could be fun to get to be the first to break him in. Before Rouge got the opportunity, anyway. She put her finger to her chin, thinking on it now...
15332222222222222222222222222122121112.title: Take a detour and have some fun as Amy! She'...

153322222222222222222222222221221211121.content: Who does she try it on?
153322222222222222222222222221221211121.title: See if the possession gloves can be used on ano...

153322222222222222222222222221221212.content: "I'm sorry, Amy... as much as i want to help out, i'm just too busy right now. You know, With the experiments and stuff" he said as he looked at her disappointed face. "Hey, don't look so down... i promise, as soon as i'm finished with this, i'll help you out" he said trying to cheer her up, which seemed to work as she smiled once again, "Ok! Thanks, well i'll be going now... don't want to be bothering you" she said as she went to the door, "Bye tails!" she said slamming the door shut. "Phew... now back to experimenting!" he said looking at rouge's still unconscious body, as he put the gloves back on...
153322222222222222222222222221221212.title: Tails decides to possess Rouge and continue

choices: "No, sorry, you have to get out."
"Alright... But you have to take Rouge's place in the experiments."
15332222222222222222222222222122122.content:
'Rouge' sighed as she concentrated, a moan escaping her lips as she opened her eyes, glazed over. Hands from somewhere under the bat's skin began to press forward, but never breach. Rouge groaned at that, shaking her head. "A-amy, get... Get out..." She whispered, barely aware right now as she moaned again, the hands sliding back into place. She blinked lightly, Amy going back into control as she frowned.

"Tails, I can't seem to get out..." She pouted as Tails frowned at that.

"That's odd..." He mused, tapping his chin. "As long as you actually want out of her, it should work."

Amy blushed at that, frowning as Rouge. "The truth is, I don't... I'm tired of needing rescued, of Sonic always running from me... I want to stay Rouge..."

Tails blinked at that, unsure of how to react to that. He hadn't planned on Amy staying inside of his test subject, and there were still plenty more things to test...
15332222222222222222222222222122122.title: Amy can't separate herself from Rouge.

choices: "...I think I'll remove your legs as well."
153322222222222222222222222221222.content:
"Ah, yes, I've just remembered something that will ensure that we never have a repeat of this particular incident." Tails said, an evil grin spreading across his face. "What is It?" Rouge asked, "What are you going to do to me?"

"An interesting fact about those gloves you're wearing Rouge. One of their security functions will remove the arms of any thief who wears them." What?! NO! NononononNOOOOOO!" Rouge screamed. "Please I'll do anything just don't take my arms!" "It's too late for that Rouge. You shouldn't have tried to betray me." And with that, as if on some invisible cue, the gloves started moving of their own accord.

They slid up until they completely covered both of Rouge's arms. Suddenly there was a slicing noise. The gloves held to Rouge's body for a few moments, emitting a red light near the shoulders, then fell away, leaving two stumps where Rouge's arms used to be. In fact there was no evidence left that she'd ever had arms at all.

Rouge broke down sobbing. "My arms... my arms..." "Oh don't be such a crybaby," Tails said, "The gloves double as a life support system. Your arms are still alive, and I can put them back on." "R-really?" "Yes really. Now then..."
153322222222222222222222222221222.title: Remove her arms temporarily.

choices: There's been a complication of some sort
The test is a success, Tails is wearing Rouge
1533222222222222222222222222212221.content:
Tails chuckled lightly as similar looking leggings rose up from the floor, attaching themselves to Rouge's legs as they wrapped over her boots. "Another interesting thing... These gloves can still be worn with your arms inside of them... They'll just give the person doing so your arms... So I'll have your arms, your legs... And the next wrapping will give me the rest of you."

He chuckled as he slipped his arms inside of Rouge's detached appendages, the gloves retreating to reveal her own arms instead of Tails'. The slicing sound returned as Rouge screamed out, trying to struggle, but now as limbless as the Black Knight, her legs flopping onto the floor as Tails picked those up as well.

"You'll still be aware, I mean, I'm not evil... I'll just happen to be looking out of your eyes and moving your body."

He shrugged, chuckling as he slipped her legs on as well as the final wrapping came around her, muffling her screams... Soon, she felt as though she were being filled up by something opening her back... And...
1533222222222222222222222222212221.title: "...I think I'll remove your legs as well..."

choices: "I think I'll just mess around with the gloves and leggings."
"I'm going to redesign my device, and we're going to try again later."
15332222222222222222222222222122211.content:
Rouge shut her eyes tightly, awaiting her fate with the utmost dread. Just then, there was noise. *ZZZT!* Rouge opened her eyes. Nothing seemed out of the ordinary, other than the fact that she was still laying on the ground limbless. Whatever Tails had intended to do, it obviously hadn't worked. Rouge looked up and saw Tails fuming.

"What just happened?" she asked, after managing to free her mouth. "APPARENTLY, your torso contained too much mass, and combined with your head, was too awkward a shape. The device tried to compensate, and shorted out." Tails said angrily. "HA! How does it feel when something doesn't work out as well as you planed?" Rouge said mockingly, forgetting for the moment that the only limbs she had were her wings.

"You think it's FUNNY? Do you have any idea how much that COST? How long it took to MAKE? It's going to take weeks to repair!" Tails shouted angrily. "Well, that's what testing is for, I guess. And anyway, it wasn't a total failure. I still have the leggings and gloves, remember?" he said, obviously trying to calm himself down. "It still didn't work as well as you wanted," Rouge taunted. "You know, your awfully cheerful, considering your arms and legs were just stolen," he retorted. Rouge's ears drooped. She HAD forgotten that. "What are you going to do now?" she asked nervously.
15332222222222222222222222222122211.title: There's been a complication of some sort

choices: Rouge continues to practice limbless takeoff.
Flash forwards to Tails finishing the device.
153322222222222222222222222221222112.content:
"Well, the only thing for it now is to redesign the original device I guess," Tails stated. "And how long is that going to take?" Rouge asked. "Well if everything goes well, it should take only a week or two," Tails replied. "And in the mean time, I'll enjoy the use of your limbs." "Hey! If you have my limbs, then what am I supposed to do?" "Not my problem. Besides, you still have your wings, find some way to entertain yourself." "Ugh, fine," Rouge replied.

Tails left the room, leaving Rouge lying on the ground with no arms or legs. She rolled over onto her stomach, then inched her way towards the nearest wall. Using the wall to get upright onto her hips, Rouge then waddled back toward the center of the room. Once there, she tried flapping her wings to get airborne, but succeeded only in knocking herself over. Fortunately, her sizable breasts cushioned the impact so it didn't her at all, though it was still embarrassing. Obviously it was going to be way harder to get into the air without the initial thrust her legs usually provided. "*Sigh* This is going to take a while," Rouge mumbled.

What now?
153322222222222222222222222221222112.title: "I'm going to redesign my device, and w...

1533222222222222222222222222212221122.content:
A few weeks later, and Rouge had finally mastered the ability to take off and land without any arms or legs, though landing was still pretty undignified. She was now able to regularly fly around the lab without any trouble, but, for obvious reasons, could not actually leave. Tails still had her limbs after all. And while she was glad that he still hadn't finished the device, (she didn't relish the idea of becoming a living costume) in a way she secretly wished he would, if only to relieve the sheer boredom associated with being limbless. The only thing she could do like this was watch TV, and there was never anything good on these days. So she continued to practice her flying.

Unfortunately for her, Tails eventually was able to complete the device. "The problem," He explained while Rouge hovered in front of him, "Was that when the device completely covered a person's body, it created empty space wherever the body curved inward. The machine would try to cut into itself because of this. I resolved the issue by making it completely form fitting, as well as dividing it into to sections; one for the head, and one for the torso itself. As for the mass problem, all that was required was a simple refinement of the power regulator system."

"So, does that mean I have to give up my ability to move independently now?" Rouge asked. "For now. Are you ready or what?" "*Sigh*, Fine, just get it over with."

What part did he put on first?
1533222222222222222222222222212221122.title: Flash forwards to Tails finishing the device.

15332222222222222222222222222122211221.content:
"Let's get started," Tails said, as he slipped a collar around Rouge's neck. "I thought you were just testing the device. What's this thing for?" Rouge asked. "The device has to be used on each piece of you separately, and will only preserve the part that it currently contains. The collar is to prevent your body from dying when your head is cut off." Tails replied as he slipped the head piece over her, Using her own arms to do so.

With the head piece on, Rouge could no longer see, though she could hear just fine. She recognized the, by now, quite familiar slicing sound that meant her head was no longer attached to the rest of her. She felt herself falling, only to be caught by Tails. There was a lifting sensation, and then a strange feeling of something entering her through the back of her head.

Her eyes opened and she looked around, though not under her own control. Presumably that was Tails testing things out. "Neat!" she heard him say using her own voice. "It worked! Now Rouge, are you ready for the next step? You should still be able to control your body. Flap your wings twice for yes, once for no." Rouge heard him and gave her body a preliminary wiggle to make sure she could control it. This done, she decided to give Tails his answer.
15332222222222222222222222222122211221.title: Her head.

choices: Tails is able to hear her
15332222222222222222222222222122211222.content:
He wrapped the skin-tight outfit over her body as it covered her torso, wincing as it tightened over her body. Tails chuckled lightly. "Don't worry, I'll be sure to take good care of my new skin..." He said as she heard the familiar slicing sound. Rouge's eyes went wide as he quickly slid the mask over her as well, and then... She heard and felt nothing.

It wasn't long before she was able to see, hear and breath again... She felt her limbs moving once more, but... She couldn't move them herself. Her hands were touching her face, as if trying to position it correctly as she heard her own voice speaking of its own accord.

"Ahhh... Now that's a successful experiment." She chuckled, stretching lightly as Rouge mentally frowned. *He did it...* She thought. *I...*
15332222222222222222222222222122211222.title: Her torso.

info.brief_description: Tails makes a deal with Rouge to test his inventions.
info.description:
Tails makes a deal with Rouge. If she lets him test his inventions on her, He'll give her a chaos emerald.

First some rules:
1. Nothing overly sexual
2. Other characters can join in
3. Inventions can involve size change, transformation, etc.
4. Please try not to end the story too early, make sure it's a decent length first
5. Try not to make additions to short, unless your giving more options
6. Have fun!
